This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bird]bird[/url] or has bird-like physical features.\n\nBirds are feathered, winged, bipedal, warm-blooded, egg-laying, vertebrate animals. Many can fly, although some cannot.
This character carries or uses some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypodermic_needle]hypedermic needles[/url].

This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalpel]scalpel[/url].\n\nA scalpel, or lancet, is a small and extremely sharp bladed instrument used for surgery, anatomical dissection, and various arts and crafts (called a hobby knife). Scalpels may be single-use disposable or re-usable. Re-usable scalpels can have attached, resharpenable blades or, more commonly, non-attached, replaceable blades. Disposable scalpels usually have a plastic handle with an extensible blade (like a utility knife) and are used once, then the entire instrument discarded. Scalpel blades are usually individually packed in sterile pouches but are also offered non-sterile.

This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorsport]motorsports[/url].\n\nMotorsport or motorsports is the group of sports which primarily involve the use of motorized vehicles, whether for racing or non-racing competition. MotoSport refers to motorcycle racing specifically and includes off-road racing such as motocross and MotoGP.
This character wears an outfit with sleeves that aren't attached to a top; instead they're strapped onto the arm close to the shoulder.

This character's true form is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grimoire]grimoire[/url], or a book of magical power. \n\nSuch books typically include instructions on how to create magical objects like talismans and amulets, how to perform magical spells, charms and divination and also how to summon or invoke supernatural entities such as angels, spirits, and demons. In many cases the books themselves are also believed to be imbued with magical powers.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perfectionism_(psychology)]perfectionist[/url].\n\nPerfectionism is a belief that work or output that is anything less than perfect is unacceptable.

This character is (or has the physical attributes of) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spider]spider[/url].\n\nThese can include the ability to create webs, wall crawl or even having eight arms or legs.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insect]insect[/url] or bears resemblance to one.\n\nInsects include butterflies, bees, ants, grasshoppers, cockroaches, beetles, flies, mantises, etc.
This characters is or shares a resmblance to a   [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Primate]primate[/url].\n\nPrimates are the family group of species like Apes, Monkeys, Lemurs etc.

This character is or shares resemblance to a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bear]bear[/url].\n\nCommon characteristics of modern bears include a large body with stocky legs, a long snout, shaggy hair, plantigrade paws with five nonretractile claws, and a short tail. While the polar bear is mostly carnivorous and the giant panda feeds almost entirely on bamboo, the remaining six species are omnivorous, with largely varied diets including both plants and animals.
This character is the victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homicide]homicide[/url] during the course of the story. Homicide refers to the act of a human killing another human.

The character partakes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shopping]shopping[/url].\n\nShopping is the examining of goods or services from retailers with the intent to purchase at that time. Shopping is an activity of selection and/or purchase. In some contexts it is considered a leisure activity as well as an economic one.
This character wears a hat with animal ears on it.

The character sports a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohawk_hairstyle]Mohawk hairstyle[/url].\n\nThe mohawk (referred to in British English as a mohican) is a hairstyle in which, in the most common variety, both sides of the head are shaven, leaving a strip of noticeably longer hair in the center. It is associated mostly with the punk rock subculture, though today mohawks have entered mainstream fashion. The mohawk is also sometimes referred to as an iro in reference to the Iroquois, from whom the hairstyle is derived.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferret]ferret[/url].\n\nThe ferret is a domesticated mammal of the type Mustela putorius furo. Ferrets are sexually dimorphic predators with males being substantially larger than females. They typically have brown, black, white, or mixed fur.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tengu]tengu[/url].\n\nTengu are a class of supernatural creatures found in Japanese folklore, art, theater, and literature. They are one of the best known youkai (monster-spirits) and are sometimes worshipped as Shinto kami (revered spirits or gods). Although they take their name from a dog-like Chinese demon (Tiangou), the tengu were originally thought to take the forms of birds of prey, and they are traditionally depicted with both human and avian characteristics. The earliest tengu were pictured with beaks, but this feature has often been humanized as an unnaturally long nose, which today is practically the tengu's defining characteristic in the popular imagination.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watch]watch[/url].\n\nA watch is a small timepiece, typically worn either on the wrist or attached on a chain and carried in a pocket, with wristwatches being the most common type of watch used today. They evolved in the 17th century from spring powered clocks, which appeared in the 15th century. The first watches were strictly mechanical. As technology progressed, the mechanisms used to measure time have, in some cases, been replaced by use of quartz vibrations or electromagnetic pulses and are called quartz movements.

This character speaks using an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansai_dialect]accent from the Kansai region of Japan[/url].

The Kansai dialect is a group of Japanese dialects in the Kansai region of Japan.
It is characterized as being both more melodic and harsher by speakers of the standard language.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loincloth]loincloth[/url].\n\nA loincloth is a one-piece garment – sometimes kept in place by a belt – which covers the genitals and, at least partially, the buttocks.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headphones]headphones or earbuds.[/url]\n\nHeadphones are a pair of small loudspeakers, or, less commonly, a single speaker, held close to a user's ears and connected to an audio source.
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nail_polish]nail polish[/url].\n\nNail polish is a lacquer applied to toenails and/or fingernails for appearance or for protection of the nails.

This character has prominent [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tan_line]tanlines[/url].\n\nTanlines are a division between an area or areas on the skin of pronounced comparative paleness relative to other areas of their body that have been suntanned.

This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piledriver_%28sexual%29]piledriver[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1696]i1696[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position the receiving partner lies on their head and upper body with their legs and hips up, while the penetrating partner stands above.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/84174.jpg]Example[/url] - Lesbians using double-ended dildo.

This character's parents were closely related to each other, genetically.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inbreeding]Inbreeding[/url] is the reproduction from the mating of two genetically related parents.

This character is a famous person. They may or may not be [url=http://vndb.org/i777]popular[/url].\n\nA [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celebrity]celebrity[/url], also referred to as a celeb in popular culture, is a person who has a prominent profile in the media implied with stardom, great popular appeal, widely known, prominent or successful in some field, and is easily recognized by the general public.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-heeled_footwear]footwear with high heels[/url].

High-heeled footwear is footwear that raises the heel of the wearer's foot significantly higher than the toes. When both the heel and the toes are raised equal amounts, as in a platform shoe, it is technically not considered to be a high heel; however, there are also high-heeled platform shoes.
High heels tend to give the aesthetic illusion of longer, more slender legs. High heels come in a wide variety of styles, and the heels are found in many different shapes, including stiletto, pump (court shoe), block, tapered, blade, and wedge.

NOTE: this trait is not applicable anymore just use one of his children.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freckle]freckles[/url].\n\nFreckles are clusters of concentrated melanin which are most often visible on people with a fair complexion. They are mostly found on the face, although they may appear on any skin exposed to the sun.

The character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_Japanese_clothing]traditional Japanese clothing[/url].\n\nThe various traditional ethnic garments worn in Japan, mainly worn for ceremonies and special occasions like weddings or festivals.

The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Familiar]familiar[/url].\n\nIn European folklore and folk-belief of the Medieval and Early Modern periods, familiar spirits (sometimes referred to simply as "familiars") were supernatural entities believed to assist witches and cunning folk in their practice of magic. According to the records of the time, they would appear in numerous guises, often as an animal, but also at times as a human or humanoid figure, and were described as "clearly defined, three-dimensional… forms, vivid with colour and animated with movement and sound" by those alleging to have come into contact with them, unlike later descriptions of ghosts with their "smoky, undefined form[s]".

At some point of the story, this character gets [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spirit_possession]possessed[/url] by another being.\n\nA preternatural entity takes residence in this person's body. The degree of control may vary, but the possessing entity is both foreign and not a naturally occurring phenomenon. Furthermore, the preternatural entity may take residence in an uninhabited vessel (such as a corpse).

During the story, this character exhibits behavior associated with the theme of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loyalty]loyalty[/url].\n\nLoyalty is faithfulness or a devotion to a person, country, group, or cause.

The character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse]cursed[/url].

A curse is any expressed wish that some form of adversity or misfortune will befall or attach to some other entity—one or more persons, a place, or an object. In particular, "curse" may refer to a wish that harm or hurt will be inflicted by any supernatural powers, such as a spell, a prayer, an imprecation, an execration, magic, witchcraft, a god, a natural force, or a spirit. In many belief systems, the curse itself (or accompanying ritual) is considered to have some causative force in the result.

This trait applies only to characters that are actually cursed by supernatural means, not just jokingly cursed by other characters.

This character dresses in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolita_fashion]Lolita style[/url].

Lolita is a fashion subculture originating in Japan that is based on Victorian-era clothing as well as costumes from the Rococo period, but the style has expanded greatly beyond these two. 
The original silhouette is of a knee length skirt or dress with a 'cupcake' shape assisted by petticoats, but has expanded into various types of garments including corsets and floor lengths skirts. Blouses, knee high socks or stockings and headdresses are also worn. 

Lolita fashion has evolved into several different sub styles and has a subculture that is present in many parts of the world.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seriousness]serious[/url] personality.

Serious people treat everything with an attitude of gravity and earnestness.

The opposite of [url=http://vndb.org/i432]relaxed[/url].
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honesty]honest[/url].\n\nHonesty is associated with virtues such as integrity, truthfulness, and straightforwardness.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_nurse]school nurse[/url].\n\nSchools have nurses to promote good health in students, and in preparation for illnesses and emergencies in students.

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promiscuity#Male_promiscuity]womanizer[/url].

A man is considered a womanizer if he has frequent relationships with various women and shows no sign of commitment. 
They may often engage in [url=http://vndb.org/i755]flirting[/url].

This trait is reserved for male characters.

This character has one or more body piercings, or they get pierced during the story.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_piercing]Body piercing[/url], a form of body modification, is the practice of puncturing or cutting a part of the human body.
This character is the non-blood-related mother of a character in this game.\n\nThis may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bisexuality]bisexual[/url].

Bisexuality is sexual behavior or an orientation involving physical or romantic attraction to both males and females, especially with regard to men and women.

It is one of the three main classifications of sexual orientation, along with a heterosexual and a homosexual orientation, all a part of the heterosexual–homosexual continuum. Pansexuality may or may not be subsumed under bisexuality, with some sources stating that bisexuality encompasses sexual or romantic attraction to all gender identities. People who have a distinct but not exclusive preference for one sex over the other may also identify themselves as bisexual, and people who lack sexual attraction to either sex or genders are known as asexual.

This character has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horn_(anatomy)]horns[/url] on the head.\n\nA horn is a pointed projection of the skin on the head of various animals, consisting of a covering of horn (keratin and other proteins) surrounding a core of living bone.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juvenile_delinquency]delinquent[/url].

A delinquent typically refers to a person of [url=http://vndb.org/i78]student age[/url] that occasionally breaks the school rules or engages in minor criminal activities.

Delinquent students are commonly seen [url=http://vndb.org/i264]smoking[/url] and/or [url=http://vndb.org/i262]drinking[/url].

This character wears and uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strap-on_dildo]strap-on dildo[/url].

A strap-on dildo is a dildo designed to be worn, usually with a harness, during sexual activity. Harnesses and dildos are made in a wide variety of styles, with variations in how the harness fits the wearer, how the dildo attaches to the harness, as well as various features intended to facilitate stimulation of the wearer or a sexual partner.

A strap-on dildo can be used for a wide variety of sexual activities, including solo or mutual masturbation, as well as penetrative oral, anal, or vaginal sex. Sexual lubricant can be used to ease insertion.

Strap-on dildos can be used by people of any sexuality or gender, upon people of any sexuality or gender.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telepathy]telepathic[/url] abilities.\n\nTelepathy refers to communication between minds by some means other than sensory perception. Examples include the capability of reading the thoughts of others around, influencing them, talking without speaking, etc.
This character is Irish.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_people]Irish people[/url] are an ethnic group who originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.

This character engages in photography.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photography]Photography [/url] is the art or practice of taking and processing pictures.

The use of this trait is not limited to professional photographers, and can be applied to characters who use any kind of instrument that can capture still images.

Clothing of this character has some kind of wings attached.\n\nThis trait is intended for characters that have wings on their clothing as an accessory and should not be mixed with the body trait wings which refers to real wings that are a part of a characters body.

This character is someone who is skilled in the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conducting]Conducting[/url] is the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures. The primary duties of the conductor are to unify performers, set the tempo, execute clear preparations and beats, and to listen critically and shape the sound of the ensemble. Orchestras, choirs, concert bands and other musical ensembles often have conductors.

This character is seen wearing the long dress of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url], Japanese priestess.\n\nThe traditional attire of a miko would be a pair of red hakama (which are long, divided trousers) or a long red slightly pleated skirt tied with a bow, a white haori (which is a kimono jacket), and some white or red hair ribbons. In Shintoism, the color white symbolizes purity.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambassador]ambassador[/url].\n\nAn ambassador is the highest ranking diplomat who represents a nation and is usually accredited to a foreign sovereign or government, or to an international organization.

This character engages in the acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.

The character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homeless]homeless[/url].\n\nHomelessness describes the condition of people without a regular dwelling. People who are homeless are unable or unwilling to acquire and maintain regular, safe, and adequate housing, or lack "fixed, regular, and adequate night-time residence."

trait_alias:
Sexual Intimidation
Sexual Bullying
Sexual Coercion
セクハラ
Sekuhara
description:
This character becomes a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Office_lady]office lady[/url].

An office lady is a female office worker in Japan who performs generally pink collar tasks such as serving tea and secretarial or clerical work. OLs are often unmarried and live with their parents well into early adulthood. Office ladies are usually full-time permanent staff, although the jobs they do usually have little opportunity for promotion, and there is usually the tacit expectation that they leave their jobs once they get married.

Often nicknamed shokuba no hana or "office flower", these women suffer discrimination due to the M-Curve. Office ladies are usually hired right after high school or junior high, with university graduates discouraged from pursuing this type of career. They are kept around the office for the youth they bring to it, hence the "flower" nickname. They are charged with routine, menial tasks meant to support the male workers. This type of career offers very little chance of advancement and was specifically designed so that women would leave for marriage before their thirties. Women between the ages of twenty four and twenty eight often are advised to settle down as a subtle message to quit, as those years are considered the most suitable for marriage.
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dancer]dancer[/url].\n\nA person who dances professionally, as on the stage.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pink-collar_worker]pink-collar worker[/url].

Pink-collar worker is a term designating a type of worker and is set to contrast with a blue-collar worker or a white-collar worker. A pink-collar worker performs work said to be stereotypical women's work and are typically in the service industry.

Pink-collar occupations tend to be personal-service oriented and are a significant portion of the economy. Waiting on tables is (along with nursing and teaching) part of the service sector, and among the most common occupations in the United States.

This character engages in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parricide]parricide[/url].

Parricide (Latin: parricida, killer of parents or another close relative) is defined as:

*    the act of murdering one's father (patricide), mother (matricide) or other close relative, but usually not children (infanticide).
*    the act of murdering a person (such as the ruler of one's country) who stands in a relationship resembling that of a father
*    a person who commits such an act.
During the course of this game's story, this character dies and later it is revealed that this death was a fake, a ploy of sorts.

This character is seen wearing a bondage harness.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_harness]bondage harness[/url] is a piece of BDSM equipment worn for the purposes of sexual bondage. It typically consists of a series of leather straps, typically between 1 and 2 cm wide, attached together in such a way as to allow a person to "wear" the item.

The item is very closely associated with BDSM play, and is often immediately identifiable as being something to do with "bondage" when depicted. For this reason, it is sometimes worn publicly as a way to reference fetish culture and gain attention.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civil_servant]civil servant[/url].

A civil servant or public servant is a person in the public sector employed in a government department or agency. The term explicitly excludes the armed services, members of which are enlisted and thus not considered ordinary civilians, although civilian officials may work at the Defense Ministry in non-enlisted positions.

Civil servants should be distinguished from politicians. A politician is someone who is involved in the decision making in issues concerning public policy, and in democracies they are usually members of a political party, and are elected by vote or appointed. Civil servants, on the other hand, are employees of the public sector, they may range from public administrators and government bureaucrats to law enforcement officers, government clerks and public works workers.

This character is wearing a randoseru.\n\nA [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randoseru]randoseru[/url] is a sturdy leather backpack most often used by elementary school children in Japan.  They are most often red for girls and black for boys.

trait_alias:
Consumption of Pornography
Watching Porn
Watching Pornography
Viewing Porn
Viewing Pornography
description: Whether it's in books, television, the internet, or games, this character participates in the consumption of  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pornography]pornography[/url].\n\nPornography or porn is the explicit portrayal of sexual subject matter for the purposes of sexual arousal and erotic satisfaction.
A side tail is like a ponytail on the side of the head.\n\nDifferent from [url=https://vndb.org/i19]Twin Tails[/url] as only the hair on one side of the head is tied up.
This trait is a meta-trait to gather all tail hair traits together.
This is a meta trait to gather all hair traits that are named by the length of the hair.
This is a meta trait to gather traits related to the type of a character's hair.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angel[/url].

Angels, in a variety of religions, are regarded as spiritual beings. They are often depicted as messengers of God in the Hebrew and Christian Bibles and the Quran.

The term "angel" has also been expanded to various notions of spiritual beings found in many other religious traditions. Other roles of angels include protecting and guiding human beings, and carrying out God's tasks.

trait_alias: Junior High School Student\nJr. High School Student
description: This character attends middle school. In Japan middle school is typically between the 7th and 9th grades and students commonly range between 12 and 15 years of age. In some countries middle school is 7th and 8th grade only and known primarily as junior high.
This character attends elementary school. Also known as primary school and grade school. Grades are typically 1st through 6th grade and the age of students are normally between 6 and 12 years old.
This character has pointed ears. Often found in legends about elves, fairies, and demons they are sometimes known as elf ears.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immortality]immortal[/url].

Immortality is the ability to live forever.

 It is unknown whether human physical immortality is an achievable condition. Biological forms have inherent limitations which may or may not be able to be overcome through medical interventions or engineering. Natural selection has developed potential biological immortality in at least one species, the jellyfish Turritopsis nutricula.

This character sports the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ringlet_%28haircut%29]ringlet hairstyle[/url].\n\nThe ringlet hairstyle is achieved by wrapping a lock of hair around the length of a thin curling iron or can be sported naturally by people with sufficiently tightly curled hair.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cape]cape[/url].\n\nA cape is any sleeveless outer garment, such as a poncho, but usually it is a long garment that covers only the back half of the wearer, fastening around the neck.
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goatee]goatee[/url].\n\nGoatee refers to a style of facial hair incorporating hair on a man’s chin.

This character engages in Polygamy.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polygamy]Polygamy[/url] is a marriage which includes more than two partners.

When a man is married to more than one wife at a time, the relationship is called polygyny, and there is no marriage bond between the wives; and when a woman is married to more than one husband at a time, it is called polyandry, and there is no marriage bond between the husbands. If a marriage includes multiple husbands and wives, it can be called group marriage.

Compare [url=/i2177]polyamory[/url], which does not require partners to be married.
This character loves to eat and is often, specially sweet things and desserts.
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confident]confident[/url].\n\nA confident person is sure of oneself; having no uncertainty about one's own abilities, correctness or success.
This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/old-fashioned]old-fashioned[/url].\n\nRefers to a person that is behind the times, not up to date, preferring the customs of earlier times.
This character is a native of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France]France[/url] or is of French descent.

This character dresses in the [url=https://buttcape.blogspot.com/2017/04/the-new-ouji-overview-part-1-terminology.html]ouji style[/url].

Ouji style is literally the boys solution to the popular japanese 'lolita' fashion. 
It involves wearing a style similar to what victorian boys wore. Including masculine blouses and shirts, knickerbockers, short trousers, knee high socks, top hats and newsboy caps. This is also what some girls use when they don't want to dress 'up like a victorian doll'.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swedish_people]Swedish[/url].\n\nSwedes are a nation and ethnic group native to Sweden, mostly inhabiting Sweden and the other Nordic countries, with descendants living in a number of countries.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iranian_peoples]Iranian[/url].\n\nThe Iranian people are an Indo-European ethnic-linguistic group that comprise the speakers of Iranian languages, a major branch of the Indo-European language family, as such forming a branch of the Indo-European-speaking people.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaniards]Spaniard[/url].\n\nThe term Spanish people (or Spaniards) has two distinct meanings: Traditionally, it applies to people native to any part of Spain. More recently, it has also come to have a legal meaning, referring to people who hold Spanish citizenship.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exile]exiled[/url].\n\nExile means to be away from one's home (i.e. city, state or country), while either being explicitly refused permission to return and/or being threatened with imprisonment or death upon return.

This character takes part in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebellion]rebellion[/url].\n\nRebellion, uprising, or insurrection is a refusal of obedience or order. It may encompass a range of behaviors aimed at destroying or replacing an established authority such as a government or a head of state. On the one hand the forms of behaviour can include non-violent methods such as the phenomena of civil disobedience, civil resistance and nonviolent resistance. On the other hand it may encompass violent campaigns. Those who participate in rebellions, especially if they are armed rebellions, are known as rebels.
This character is religious. Which religion doesn't matter, but it is a significant part of their character in the story.
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atheist]atheist[/url].\n\nAtheism is, in a broad sense, the rejection of belief in the existence of deities.
This meta-trait is designed to gather all traits regarding characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religious beliefs[/url] that came strongly forward during games' stories.

This character has a mature personality.\n\nIn terms of personality, is a person fully developed in terms of thinking. If used to refer to a young person, his/her behavior is not typical of it's age, as this person usually acts like a grown up or a more aged and wised one.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sideburns]sideburns[/url].

Sideburns are patches of facial hair grown on the sides of the face, extending from the hairline to below the ears and worn with an unbearded chin.

Sideburns can be worn and grown in combination with other styles of facial hair, such as the moustache or goatee, but once they extend from ear to ear via the chin they cease to be sideburns and become a beard, chinstrap beard, or chin curtain.

This character is a follower or believes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacifism]pacifism[/url].

Pacifism is the opposition to war and violence.

The character does not like war or fighting. Preferring a non-violent, non-confrontational method to settle disputes.
This character engages in sexual acts in a public location. For example, in a park, a train, or school.

This character is a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper]sniper[/url]. \n\nA sniper is a highly trained marksman who operates in one to two man teams which maintain close visual contact with the enemy and engages targets from concealed positions or physical distances exceeding the detection capabilities of the enemy personnel, without being detected.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper_rifle]sniper rifle[/url].\n\nIn military and law enforcement terminology, a sniper rifle is a precision-rifle used to ensure more accurate placement of bullets at longer ranges than other small arms. A typical sniper rifle is built for optimal levels of accuracy, fitted with a telescopic sight and chambered for a military centerfire cartridge.

This character competes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhythmic_gymnastics]Rhythmic Gymnastics[/url].\n\nRhythmic gymnastics is a sport in which individuals or teams of competitors (2 or more people) manipulate one or two pieces of apparatus: rope, clubs, hoop, ball, ribbon and Free (no apparatus, so called "floor routine"). An individual athlete only manipulates 1 apparatus at a time. When multiple gymnasts are performing a routine together a maximum of two types of apparatus may be distributed through the group. An athlete can exchange apparatus with a team member at any time through the routine. Therefore, an athlete can manipulate up to two different pieces of apparatus through the duration of the routine. Rhythmic gymnastics is a sport that combines elements of ballet, gymnastics, dance, and apparatus manipulation. The victor is the participant who earns the most points, determined by a panel of judges, for leaps, balances, pirouettes (pivots), flexibilities, apparatus handling, execution, and artistic effect.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_student]medical student[/url].\n\nA person accepted into a medical school and enrolled in an educational program in medicine is referred to as a medical student.

This character works in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management]management[/url] career. Management is the process of getting people together to accomplish desired goals and objectives using available resources efficiently and effectively.
