description: This character is in an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Executive_%28management%29]executive career[/url]. An executive is an individual at the highest level of organizational management who have the day-to-day responsibilities of managing a company or corporation.

This character is a student in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kindergarten]kindergarten[/url]. The term kindergarten is used around the world to describe a variety of different institutions that have been developed for children ranging from the ages of two to seven, depending on the country concerned.

This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wig]wig[/url].\n\nA wig is a head of hair made from horsehair, human hair, wool, feathers, yak hair, buffalo hair, or synthetic materials which is worn on the head for fashion or various other aesthetic and stylistic reasons, including cultural and religious observance.

The character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_gun]machine gun[/url].\n\nA machine gun is a fully automatic mounted or portable firearm, usually designed to fire rounds in quick succession from an ammunition belt or large-capacity magazine, typically at a rate of several hundred rounds per minute.

This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crutches]crutch or crutches[/url].\n\nA crutch is a device used to counter a mobility impairment or an injury that limits walking ability.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossbow]crossbow[/url].\n\nA crossbow is a weapon consisting of a bow mounted on a stock that shoots projectiles, often called bolts or quarrels.

This character doesn't act maturely.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maturity_%28psychological%29]Maturity[/url] is a psychological term used to indicate how a person responds to the circumstances or environment in an appropriate manner.

This character frequently uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer]computer[/url] for work or a hobby.\n\nThe characters makes use out of the benefits a computer can provide including installing/downloading unique programs etc.

This character is never referred by his/her name. Titles such as 'sensei' or 'onii-chan' are used by the characters when they are talking to or about this character. When required, the game displays this character's name as 'Protagonist', 'Player', 'Student A' or something similar.\n\nThis should not be mixed with the [url=http://vndb.org/i593]Nameable[/url] trait, since this character's name cannot be changed.

This character's hair has more than one color in it. For example, the hair may be striped or gradated.

Note: ONLY use this trait when the character has several colours in their hair.

Example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10040]Aaron Vanich[/url] has multicolored hair.
Counter example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10551]Crayanne[/url] does NOT have multicolored hair.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corset]corset[/url]. 

A corset is a garment worn to hold and shape the torso into a desired shape for aesthetic or medical purposes (either for the duration of wearing this item, or with a more lasting effect).

In recent years, the term "corset" has also been borrowed by the fashion industry to refer to tops which, to varying degrees, mimic the look of traditional corsets without actually acting as one. While these modern corsets and corset tops often feature lacing and/or boning and generally mimic a historical style of corsets, they have very little if any effect on the shape of the wearer's body.

[url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140909061051/http://www.japan-101.com/culture/hadaka_apron_japanese_clothing_fetish.htm]Naked Apron or Hadaka Apron[/url] in Japanese is a small niche clothing fetish.\n\nNaked Apron is used to refer to when a person, usually a woman, wears an apron over a nude, or partially underwear or swimsuit covered, body.

This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fashion_design]fashion design[/url].\n\nFashion design is the art of the application of design and aesthetics or natural beauty to clothing and accessories. Some work alone or as part of a team.

This character performs a hairjob. Apply [url=/i1655]i1655[/url] to the receiving character.

A hairjob is the act of using one's hair to stimulate a male partner's penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/119110.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character's nipples are inverted instead of pointing outward typical of most females.\n\nInverted nipples may be subject to stimulation possibly resulting in the reversal of their initial inversion.
This character engages in consuming large quantities of semen at once, typically from multiple partners.

This character has stubble.\n\nStubble refers to facial hair which has been shaven and just begun to regrow.  It is short, with a rough texture.  Stubble can be a deliberate grooming choice ("designer stubble") or merely due to growth in between clean shaves ("five o'clock shadow").

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Native_Americans_in_the_United_States]Native American[/url].\n\nNative Americans in the United States are the indigenous peoples in North America within the boundaries of the present-day continental United States, parts of Alaska, and the island state of Hawaii. They are composed of numerous, distinct Native American tribes and ethnic groups, many of which survive as intact political communities
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kigurumi]kigurumi[/url] or animal costume. They can also represent cartoon characters.

This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tray]tray[/url].

A tray is a shallow platform designed for carrying things. It is larger than a salver, a diminutive version commonly used for lighter and smaller servings, and it can be fashioned from numerous materials, including silver, brass, sheet iron, wood, melamine, and papier-mâché. Some examples have raised galleries, handles, and short feet for support.

Trays are flat, but with raised edges to stop things from sliding off of them. They are made in a range of shapes but are commonly found in oval or rectangular forms, sometimes with cutout or attached handles with which to carry them.
This character is partially or completely [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deafness]deaf[/url].\n\nDeafness, or hearing impairment, is a partial or total inability to hear.
This character has garnet eye color.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diaper]diaper[/url].\n\nA diaper is a kind of underwear that allows one to defecate or urinate on oneself discreetly. When diapers become soiled, they require changing; this process is often performed by a second person such as a parent or caregiver. Failure to change a diaper on a regular enough basis can result in diaper rash.

This character is grumbler.\n\nThe position of such characters is to go against the opinion of others and to complain about any events that occur around them. Such people are quite difficult to please.

This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stun_grenade]stun grenade[/url].\n\nThese grenades are used to temporally neutralize the combat effectiveness of enemies by disorienting their senses. The flash of light momentarily activates all light sensitive cells in the eye, making vision impossible for approximately five seconds until the eye restores itself to its normal, unstimulated state. The loud blast produced by the grenade adds to its incapacitating properties by disturbing the fluid in the ear.

This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninjato]ninjato[/url].\n\nThe ninjatō is typically depicted as being a short sword, often portrayed as having a straight blade (similar to that of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shikomizue#Shikomizue]shikomizue[/url]) with a square guard. Usually of a length "less than 60 cm", the rest of the sword is comparatively "thick, heavy and straight".

This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/docile]docile[/url].\n\nDifferent from being [url=http://vndb.org/i250]shy[/url] or [url=http://vndb.org/i452]timid[/url], docile people are not [url=http://vndb.org/i248]outgoing[/url] and are typically very compliant.

This character was put into [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspended_animation]artificial sleep[/url] or hibernation.\n\nSuspended animation is the slowing of life processes by external means without termination. Breathing, heartbeat, and other involuntary functions may still occur, but they can only be detected by artificial means. Extreme cold can be used to precipitate the slowing of an individual's functions; use of this process has led to the developing science of cryonics. Cryonics is another method of life preservation but it cryopreserves organisms using liquid nitrogen that will preserve the organism until reanimation.

This character wears a [url=http://romenov.com/daniel/?p=614]ninja suit[/url].

Usually the ninja wore more appropriate clothes to disguise the day-to-day activity or to mingle with the population, without attracting attention. One characteristic of the shinobi shozoku are the various compartments used to conceal weapons and other tools.

Each family had its own shinobi shozoku, with individual modifications appropriate to what they thought best for the moment, type of mission or for the season.

This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grenade]grenades[/url].\n\nThe term grenade refers to any explosive device designed to be thrown by hand. Most grenades explode, projecting fragments, i.e., pieces of the casing, serrated wire, or an incendiary material.

This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_bomb]smoke bombs[/url].\n\nSmoke bombs can be used to create a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_screen]smoke screen[/url], as a ground-to-ground or ground-to-air signaling devices, fireworks, etc. Smoke bombs are normally considered non-lethal, although incorrect use may cause death.

This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intercrural_sex]intercrural sex[/url]. Apply this trait to the character thrusting their penis between their partner's thighs. Apply [url=/i1631]i1631[/url] to the other character.\n\nIntercrural sex is a type of non-penetrative sex, in which a male places his penis between his partner's thighs and thrusts to create friction.

This character's eyes are drawn with the top eyelid slanted outwards. This usually produces a weak, gentle look.\n\nDue to it's common usage in anime and games it's often noticeable only in series when other characters don't share the trait or as a contrast to characters with [url=/i918]Tsurime[/url].
This character's eyes are drawn with the top eyelid slanted inwards. This usually produces a strong, piercing look.\n\nIt is the opposite of [url=/i917]Tareme[/url].
This character has cyan hair.\n\nPlease see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pendant]pendant[/url].\n\nA pendant is a loose-hanging piece of jewellery, generally attached by a small loop to a necklace, when the ensemble may be known as a "pendant necklace". A pendant earring is an earring with a piece hanging down.
This character has [url=http://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyan]cyan[/url] eyes.\n\nIt is a light blue color with a subtle hint of green.

This character's eye shape resembles that of normal people from the "real world". However, in the world of anime such cut of eyes is most common among the adults and villains; with normal characters having big, round eyes.

The eyes of this character are always [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/EyesAlwaysShut]closed[/url].\n\nBy the laws of the anime genre, this sort of eyes can occur among the wise or sly people as well as among the dangerous folks who can explode with incredible rage, when they get angry.

This character's pupils are slits, as opposed to dilated pupils.

In real life these can be found on cats and several species of reptiles.

In fiction, supernatural beings like demons, monsters, vampires etc. would have such a trait. 
Normal human characters rarely have this.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c9433]Foxy[/url]

This character is the receiving participant in a bukkake scene.\n\nBukkake refers to scenes featuring a person being ejaculated on by several men, or in some cases a single man over and over. The main point is for the recipient's body to be covered with semen.
This character has teal hair.\n\nPlease see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teal]teal[/url] eyes.\n\nTeal is a low-saturation color, a bluish-green to dark medium, similar to medium blue-green and dark cyan. It can be created by mixing green with blue into a white base, or deepened as needed with a little bit of black or gray color.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-orphan]half-orphan[/url].\n\nAn half-orphan is a child bereaved one of his or her parents. In common usage, only a child who has lost one of parents is called an half-orphan. However, adults can also be referred to as half-orphans, or "adult half-orphans".

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absentminded]absentminded[/url]. \n\nAbsent-mindedness is a mental condition in which the subject experiences low levels of attention and frequent distraction. Absent-mindedness is not a diagnosed condition but rather a symptom of boredom and sleepiness which people experience in their daily lives. When suffering from absent-mindedness, people tend to show signs of memory lapse and weak recollection of recently occurring events. This can usually be a result of a variety of other conditions often diagnosed by clinicians such as ADD and depression. In addition to absent-mindedness leading to an array of consequences affecting daily life, it can have as more severe, long-term problems.

This character is often shown wearing [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panties]panties[/url].

Panties are a form of underwear designed to be worn by women and children in the crotch area below the waist. Typical components include an elastic waistband, a crotch panel to cover the genital area (usually lined with absorbent material such as cotton), a pair of leg openings which, like the waistband, are often made of elastic, and constructed with material that is breathable. Whilst panties were originally designed to cover the entire lower half of the female form, the modern version (since the 1970s) has either no legs or, in some cases, very short ones, and has become progressively more revealing over time.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's undergarment is briefly shown. Use it on occasions where characters are displaying their undergarments occasionally either because their other clothing are designed in a way that it reveals them or when they don't wear anything else to cover their undergarments.

This character is often shown wearing a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brassiere]bra[/url].

A brassiere is a woman's undergarment that supports her breasts. Bras are typically form-fitting and perform a variety of functions and have also evolved into a fashion item. The primary purpose of a bra is to enhance the wearer's comfort by supporting her breasts.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's undergarment is briefly shown. Use it on occasions where characters are displaying their undergarments occasionally either because their other clothing are designed in a way that it reveals them or when they don't wear anything else to cover their undergarments.

This character wears no panties or any other form of lower body undergarments even though they are otherwise clothed. In Japan it's shortened to 'Nopan' when a girl wears a skirt with no panties. Sometimes called 'Commando' or '[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Going_Commando]Going Commando[/url]' in the west.\n\nDo not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's lack of undergarments are briefly shown. Use it on occasions where a character's lack of panties is revealed as part of the story or character design.
This character wears a sports [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform]uniform[/url].\n\nA sports suit consists of pants or shorts, jacket (blazer) and sometimes t-shirt.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia#Central_heterochromia]central heterochromia[/url].\n\nCentral heterochromia is an eye condition where there are two colors in the same iris; the central (pupillary) zone of the iris is a different color than the mid-peripheral (ciliary) zone, with the true iris color being the outer color.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shield]shield[/url].

A shield is a type of personal armor, meant to intercept attacks, either by stopping projectiles such as arrows or redirecting a hit from a sword, mace or battle axe to the side of the shield-bearer.

Shields vary greatly in size, ranging from large panels that protect the user's entire body to small models (such as the buckler) that were intended for hand-to-hand-combat use.

This character has sex in the [url=http://www.sofeminine.co.uk/relationships/album856252/sex-positions-kamasutra-sex-positions-21211764.html]tominagi[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1702]i1702[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner kneels in front of the receiving partner, with their torso mostly upright, while the receiving partner lies on their back, with their legs folded. They may rest their feet against the penetrating partner's torso.

This is similar to other butterfly positions, but the receiving partner is in a noticeably "curled up" position.

If the penetrating partner's torso is mostly horizontal and on top of the receiving partner, consider using the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] trait instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/13/84313.jpg]Example 1a[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/84314.jpg]Example 1b[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/71/84171.jpg]Counter-example 1[/url] - Use [url=/i93]missionary[/url] instead since the penetrating partner is on top of, instead of in front of, the receiving partner.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Housewife]housewife[/url].\n\nHousewife is a term used to describe a married woman whose main occupation is running or operating the family's home—caring for and educating her children, cooking and storing food, buying goods the family needs in day to day life, cleaning or maintaining parts of the home, making clothes for the family, etc.—and who does not generally maintain employment outside the home.

This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ballet]ballet[/url].\n\nBallet is a type of performance dance, that originated in the Italian Renaissance courts of the 15th century. It's a form of classical dance that's seemingly gymnastic and acrobatic often preformed to formal classical music.

trait_alias:
Steel pipe
Metall pipe
Metall cylinder
Steel cylinder
Metall tube
Steel tube
Metall tube
description: This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pipe_%28fluid_conveyance%29]pipe[/url].\n\nA hollow cylinder usually made of metall, normally used for the conveyance of water, gas, steam, petroleum, etc. As a weapon it's hollowness makes it lighter and faster than a solid rod while still retaining a strong durability.

This character gets shocked by electricity.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_shock]Electric shock[/url] occurs upon contact of a (human) body with any source of electricity that causes a sufficient current through the skin, muscles, or hair. Typically, the expression is used to describe an injurious exposure to electricity. When exposed to a lethal electrical shock one is electrocuted.

This character suffers from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuromuscular_disease]neuromuscular disease[/url].\n\nNeuromuscular disease is a very broad term that encompasses many diseases and ailments that either directly, via intrinsic muscle pathology, or indirectly, via nerve pathology, impair the functioning of the muscles.

The character has sex with a creature that could be considered a monster.

Furries or characters with only a few monstrous features like a tail, animal ears, or horns should usually not be considered monsters. Examples of monsters include orcs, goblins, minotaurs, or other unnatural creatures.

In case of sexual acts with overgrown insects or insectoid-like monsters, use [url=/i2866]Sex with Insects[/url] instead.

This character has sex with animals. Part-human, part-animal characters like [url=https://vndb.org/c4645]Mikan[/url] or [url=https://vndb.org/c5266]Tamamo[/url] don't count as "animals" for this trait.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zoophilia]Bestiality[/url] is the practice of sexual activity between humans and non-human animals (bestiality), or a preference for or fixation on such practice.

Apply this trait to the human participant. Don't apply it to the animal participant.

This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Wiki-dthroat.png]deep-throating[/url]. Apply this trait to the character taking their partner's penis into their mouth, and apply [url=/i1641]Subject of (Sexual) >> Deepthroat[/url] to the character whose penis is being stimulated.\n\nDeep-throating is a sexual act in which a character takes their partner's entire erect penis deep into their mouth, past the epiglottis and into the throat. The practice is a type of fellatio, a form of oral sex.

trait_alias:
Ahe Gao
Ahe-gao
Ahegaokin
Fucked silly
Sloppy face sex
アヘ顔
description: This character is depicted with the facial expression called [url=http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/ahegaokin-%E3%82%A2%E3%83%98%E9%A1%94%E8%8F%8C]ahegao[/url].\n\nThe ahegao is an overly exaggerated orgasmic expression, the eyes usually rolled up with teardrops/sweat at times, the mouth wide open with the tongue sticking out and blushing cheeks.

A character from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singapore]Singapore[/url].\n\nSingapore, officially the Republic of Singapore, is a southeast asian city-state off the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula, 137 kilometers north of the equator. An island country made up of 63 islands, it is separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to its north and from Indonesia's Riau Islands by the Singapore Strait to its south. The country is highly urbanised with very little primary rainforest remaining, although more land is being created for development through land reclamation.

The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stalking]stalking[/url].

Stalking is a term commonly used to refer to unwanted, obsessive attention by individuals (and sometimes groups of people) to others.
Stalking can be defined as the willful and repeated following, watching, and / or harassing of another person. Most of the time, the purpose of stalking is to attempt to force a relationship with someone who is unwilling or otherwise unavailable. Unlike other crimes, which usually involve one act, stalking is a series of actions that occur over a period of time. Although stalking is illegal, the actions that contribute to stalking are legal, such as gathering information, calling someone on the phone, sending gifts, emailing or instant messaging. Such actions by themselves are not usually abusive, but can become abusive when frequently repeated over time.

This character is left handed.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handedness]Left-handedness[/url] is the preference for the left hand over the right for everyday activities such as writing. In ancient times it was seen as a sign of the devil, and was abhorred in many cultures. A variety of studies suggest that 13% of the world population is left-handed.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blouse]blouse[/url].\n\nA blouse is a loose-fitting upper garment that was formerly worn by workmen, peasants, artists, women and children. It is typically gathered at the waist (by a waistband or belt) so that it hangs loosely over the wearer's body. Today, the word most commonly refers to a woman's shirt.

trait_alias:
Physical Education Teacher
Gymnastics Teacher
Gym Teacher
Phys. Ed. Teacher
P.E. Teacher
description: This character is a teacher responsible for physical education of students.\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physical_education]Physical education[/url] or gymnastics is a course taken during primary and secondary education that encourages psychomotor learning in a play or movement exploration setting.

This character has a short [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hime_cut]hime cut[/url] hairstyle.\n\nA short Hime cut is a hairstyle consisting of straight, cheek to chin length sidelocks and blunt bangs. With the rest of the hair shorter than the shoulders and straightened.

This character works at a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host_club]hostess club[/url].\n\nA host / hostess light cigarettes, pour drinks, offer flirtatious conversation and perform to entertain the customers.

This character wears a yukata.\n\nA [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yukata]yukata[/url] is a casual summer kimono. Yukata are worn at Japanese inns after bathing and outdoor summer events such as fireworks displays and bon-odori festivals.

This character comes from a Thai origin.\n\nThe [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thai_people]Thai people[/url] are the main ethnic group of Thailand and are part of the larger Tai ethnolinguistic peoples found in Thailand and adjacent countries in Southeast Asia as well as southern China.
This character has grey hair color.\n\nPlease see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goat]goat[/url].\n\nThe domestic goat is a subspecies of goat domesticated from the wild goat of southwest Asia and Eastern Europe. The goat is a member of the family Bovidae and is closely related to the sheep as both are in the goat-antelope subfamily Caprinae. There are over 300 distinct breeds of goat. Goats are one of the oldest domesticated species, and have been used for their milk, meat, hair, and skins over much of the world.
This character is a younger sister.\n\nA younger sister is a female sibling who is younger than at least one of the other siblings.
This character is an older sister.\n\nAn older sister is a female sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.
This character is a younger brother.\n\nA younger brother is a male sibling who is younger than at least one of the other siblings.
This character is an older brother.\n\nAn older brother is a male sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cravat]cravat[/url].\n\nA cravat is a neckband, this term applied to any long-strip neckcloth that was not a ruff. The ruff, a starched, pleated white linen strip, can also be a bib, or a napkin. A band can be either a plain, attached shirt collar or a detachable "falling band" that draped over the doublet collar.

This character often carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puppet]puppet[/url].\n\nA puppet is an inanimate object or representational figure animated or manipulated by an entertainer, who is called a puppeteer. It is used in puppetry, a play or a presentation that is a very ancient form of theatre.
This character has fangs, or only one fang for cuteness.
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuki-onna]yuki-onna[/url], the semi-spirit entity which controls ice, cold weather or just can freeze everything.

The character with this trait is a participant in genetic research. This character participated in the research as a scientist/researcher.\n\nGenetics deals with the molecular structure and function of genes, with gene behavior in the context of a cell or organism (e.g. dominance and epigenetics), with patterns of inheritance from parent to offspring, and with gene distribution, variation and change in populations. Given that genes are universal to living organisms, genetics can be applied to the study of all living systems, from viruses and bacteria, through plants (especially crops) and domestic animals, to humans (as in medical genetics).

This character has blunt bangs.\n\nBlunt bangs are straight cut bangs, done with straight or almost straight hair. The edges must be horizontal (not spiky, even if the spikes are in the same length!).
This character has V-shaped bangs.

This character wears an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armband]armband[/url]\n\nAn armband is a piece of material worn around the arm over the sleeve of other clothing if present. they may be worn for pure ornamentation to mark the wearer as belonging to group, having a certain rank or role, or being in a particular state or condition.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].

A bracelet is an article of jewelry that is worn around the wrist. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells. 

Bracelets are also used for medical and identification purposes, such as allergy bracelets and hospital patient-identification tags.

This character wears an ankle [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].\n\nAn anklet (or an ankle bracelet) is an article of jewelry that is worn around the the ankle. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspenders]suspenders[/url].\n\nSuspenders or braces are fabric or leather straps worn over the shoulders to hold up trousers. Straps may be elasticated, either entirely or only at attachment ends and most straps are of woven cloth forming an X or Y shape at the back. Braces are typically attached to trousers with buttons using leather tabs at the ends or with clips.

trait_alias: A Poor Student\nA Weak Student\nAn "F" Student
description:
This character is a bad student.

A bad student is a student who doesn't try to learn and doesn't care about studying, is just really careless, lazy, and doesn't try when it comes to learning. Or they just are not good at studying, even if they are not being lazy and are actually doing their best. 

Also, if someone has to go to summer school it would be a bad student. They also get a lot of D's and F's and never get A's or B's.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honors_student]honor student[/url].

An honors student is a person recognized for achieving high grades or high marks in their course work.
Honor students are recognized for their academic achievement on lists published periodically throughout the school year, known as honor rolls, varying from school to school, and from different levels of education.
This meta-trait is designed to house student traits that are grade specific.
This meta-trait is designed to house student traits by activity.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straw_hat]straw hat[/url].\n\nA straw hat is a brimmed hat that is woven out of straw or reeds. The hat is designed to protect the head from the sun and against heatstroke, but straw hats were also used in fashion and as a decorative element of a uniform.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pessimism]pessimist[/url].

Pessimism is a state of mind in which one anticipates undesirable outcomes or believes that the evil or hardships in life outweighs the good or luxuries.
These characters typically expect everything to go wrong, often depressing others.

The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Model_%28profession%29]model[/url].\n\nA model is a person who is employed to display, advertise and promote commercial products (notably fashion clothing) or to serve as a subject of works of art.

This character is overconfident.\n\nOverconfidence is a well-established bias in which someone's subjective confidence in their judgments is reliably greater than their objective accuracy, especially when [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confidence]confidence[/url] is relatively high.

This character is selling goods, food or anything else. However, he may not be the owner of the store.\n\nA [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vendor]vendor[/url] or a supplier, is a supply chain management term that means anyone who provides goods or services to a company or individuals. A vendor often manufactures inventoriable items, and sells those items to a customer.

This character uses his intelligence for selfish purposes. To achieve his goals, he can use deception, blackmail, and other tricks. But having a difficult character, such people are not necessarily bad.

This character tries to seduce another character(s).\n\n[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seduction]Seduction[/url], seen negatively, involves temptation and enticement, often sexual in nature, to lead someone astray into a behavioral choice they would not have made if they were not in a state of sexual arousal. Especially, it may be a treason against the wife/husband or girlfriend/boyfriend. Seen positively, seduction is a synonym for the act of charming someone by an appeal to the senses, often with the goal of reducing unfounded fears and leading to their "sexual emancipation".

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towel]bath towel[/url].

A towel is a piece of absorbent fabric or paper used for drying or wiping. It draws moisture through direct contact, often using a blotting or a rubbing motion. Common household textile towels are made from cotton, rayon, bamboo, nonwoven fibers or a few other materials.

A bath towel is used for drying the body after bathing, showering or swimming. It is typically rectangular, with a typical size around 30"×60" (75×150 cm). A large bath towel is sometimes called a bath sheet.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tube_top]strapless shirt[/url].\n\nA tube top is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that wraps around the upper torso. It is generally tight over the breasts, usually by means of elastic bands at its top and bottom.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bolo_tie]bolo tie[/url].\n\nA bolo tie  is a type of necktie consisting of a piece of cord or braided leather with decorative metal tips or aglets (aiguillettes) secured with an ornamental clasp or slide.

This character wears a strapless dress.\n\nA strapless dress is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that consists of a skirt with an attached bodice (or a matching bodice giving the effect of a one-piece garment).

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]turtleneck sweater[/url].\n\nA polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) sweater is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

trait_alias:
polo neck shirt
roll-neck shirt
shirt with a turtleneck
skivvy shirt
description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]shirt with a turtleneck[/url].\n\nA polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) shirt is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

trait_alias: polo neck dress\nroll-neck dress\ndress with a turtleneck
description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]dress with a turtleneck[/url].\n\nA polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) dress is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnet_%28headgear%29]bonnet[/url]. 

The most common kind of bonnet worn today is a soft headcovering for babies. They are shaped similarly to the kind of bonnets women used to wear, that is they cover the hair and ears, but not the forehead.

However the term has also been used, for example, for steel helmets. We don't use this meaning in the database.

This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_cross]christian cross[/url].

The Christian cross, seen as a representation of the instrument of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, is the best-known religious symbol of Christianity. It is related to the crucifix (a cross that includes a usually three-dimensional representation of Jesus' body) and to the more general family of cross symbols.

Do not mix with the necklace version, [url=http://vndb.org/i159]Cross Necklace[/url] or other crosses that appear on clothing or as accessories. This trait is for a larger cross that is held on the hand or hung on a wall.

trait_alias:
Part-time job girl / boy
Part-time work
Arubaito
Baito shoujo
アルバイト
description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Part-time]part-time worker[/url].\n\nA part-time job is a form of employment that carries fewer hours per week than a full-time job. Workers are considered to be part-time if they commonly work fewer than 30 or 35 hours per week. There are many reasons for working part-time, including the desire to do so, having one's hours cut back by an employer and being unable to find a full-time job.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Retail_clerk]shop clerk[/url].\n\nA retail clerk obtains or receives merchandise, totals bills, accepts payment, and makes change for customers in retail stores such as drug stores, candy stores, or liquor stores (thus, the position may partially overlap with that of cashier). They clean shelves, counters, or tables; stock shelves, counters, or tables with merchandise; set up advertising displays or arrange merchandise on counters or tables to promote sales; stamp, mark, or tag prices on merchandise; and obtain merchandise requested by customers or receive merchandise selected by customers. They are expected to answer customers' questions concerning location, price, and use of merchandise; to total price and tax on merchandise purchased by customers to determine bill; and to accept payment, make change, and wrap or bag the merchandise for customers. They may remove and record the amount of cash in register at end of shift. A retail clerk, particularly in a smaller store, may keep record of sales, prepare inventory of stock, or order merchandise.
This character is the manager of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormitory]dormitory[/url].

trait_alias:
Spiky Hairstyle
Spiky Hair Style
Spiked Cut
Spiked Haircut
description: This character has a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SpikyHair]spiky hairstyle[/url].\n\nSpiky hair is the process of using products to make the hair stand on end like spikes sticking out of the head. It's often associated with the punk rock subculture and, in fiction, it's used to show that a character is wild and cool as well as being badass. While spiky hair is prominent in real life, fictional characters are almost always shown with perfectly spiked hair despite the fact that it would get flattened while they're in bed. While it is a typically male hairstyle, it has become somewhat fashionable for women to have a spiky hairstyle.

This character wears a ribbon tie.\n\nThe ribbon tie is a long piece of thin cloth worn for decorative purposes around the neck or shoulders, resting under the shirt collar and knotted at the throat. It is usually tied in a bow.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon]ribbons[/url].\n\nA ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.

trait_alias:
Wrist Ribbon
Thigh Ribbon
Arm Ribbon
Leg Ribbon
Waist Ribbon
description: This character wears a ribbon around their arm, leg or any other place of the body, except for the neck and hair.
This character has the Christian Cross as earrings.
This character has a Christian Cross as part of the design element of their clothing.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lactation]lactates[/url].\n\nLactation describes the secretion of milk from the mammary glands. Lactation can be induced in humans by a combination of physical and psychological stimulation, by drugs, or by a combination of those methods. It can be stimulated outside of pregnancy for sexual purposes.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_cross]christian cross[/url] is a part of this characters clothing and accessories.\n\nThe Christian cross, seen as a representation of the instrument of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, is the best-known religious symbol of Christianity. It is related to the crucifix (a cross that includes a usually three-dimensional representation of Jesus' body) and to the more general family of cross symbols.
Pendant earrings are earrings with a piece hanging down.\n\nExample: https://s.vndb.org/ch/35/29835.jpg

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewellery]Jewellery[/url].

Jewellery is a form of personal adornment, such as brooches, rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets.

With some exceptions, such as medical alert bracelets or military dog tags, jewellery normally differs from other items of personal adornment in that it has no other purpose than to look appealing, but humans have been producing and wearing it for a long time – with 100,000-year-old beads made from Nassarius shells thought to be the oldest known jewellery.

Jewellery may be made from a wide range of materials, but gemstones, precious metals, beads and shells have been widely used. Depending on the culture and times jewellery may be appreciated as a status symbol, for its material properties, its patterns, or for meaningful symbols. Jewellery has been made to adorn nearly every body part, from hairpins to toe rings.

This character wears bands and or straps.\n\nBands are long thin pieces of cloth or leather that can be wrapped around various parts of the body as accessories, to hold pants and skirts above ones waist or for other purposes such as medical use of bandages.

This character wears straps.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straps]strap[/url], sometimes also called strop, is an elongated flap or ribbon, usually of fabric or leather.

Thin straps are used as part of clothing or baggage, or bedding such as a sleeping bag. See for example spaghetti strap, shoulder strap. A strap differs from a belt mainly in that a strap is usually integral to the item of clothing; either can be used in combination with buckles.
This character has no scenes of sexual activity in any visual novel.

This character wears clothing decorated with ribbons.\n\nA ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.
This character wears a real or fake flower as an accessory on his clothes.
This character has some kind of symbol or picture in his/her eye(s).\n\n[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/79350.jpg]Example[/url].

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Veil]veil[/url].

A veil is an article of clothing, worn almost exclusively by women, that is intended to cover some part of the head or face.

One view is that as a religious item, it is intended to show honor to an object or space. The actual sociocultural, psychological, and sociosexual functions of veils have not been studied extensively but most likely include the maintenance of social distance and the communication of social status and cultural identity. In Islamic society, various forms of the veil have been adopted from the Arab culture in which Islam arose.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saw]saw[/url].\n\nA saw is a tool that uses a hard blade, wire, or chain with a toothed edge to cut through softer materials. A saw may be worked by hand, or powered by steam, water, electricity or other power. An abrasive saw uses a powered circular blade for cutting metal.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_saw]hand saw[/url].\n\nHand saws are used to cut pieces of wood into different shapes. This is usually done in order to join the pieces together and create a wooden object. They usually operate by having a series of sharp points of some substance that is harder than the wood being cut. The hand saw is a bit like a tenon saw, but with one flat, sharp edge.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chainsaw]chainsaw[/url].\n\nA chainsaw is a portable mechanical saw, powered by electricity, compressed air, hydraulic power, or most commonly a two-stroke engine. It is used in activities such as tree felling, limbing, bucking, pruning, by tree surgeons to fell trees and remove branches and foliage, to fell snags and assist in cutting firebreaks in wildland fire suppression, and to harvest firewood. Chainsaws with specially designed bar and chain combinations have been developed as tools for use in chainsaw art. Specialist chainsaws are used for cutting concrete.

This character is tiny compared to regular humans, small enough to fit into the hand of a regular human. This is an example though, actual size may vary.\n\nWhile fairies are usually depicted at this size, the trait is not exclusive to them nor applies to them all. There may be many other fantastical explanations, like the potion Alice drank in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice_in_Wonderland]Alice's Adventures in Wonderland[/url] that made her tiny enough to fit a very, very small door.
This character has claret hair.\n\nPlease see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wand]wand[/url].\n\nA wand is a thin, straight, hand-held stick of wood, stone, ivory, or metal. Generally, in modern language, wands are ceremonial and/or have associations with magic but there have been other uses, all stemming from the original meaning as a synonym of rod and virge, both of which had a similar development. A stick giving length and leverage is perhaps the earliest and simplest of tools.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sceptre]sceptre[/url].\n\nA sceptre is a symbolic ornamental rod or wand borne in the hand by a ruling monarch as an item of royal or imperial insignia. It is usually much longer than a wand.
This character has [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/79337.jpg]spiky bangs[/url].

This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blunt_instrument]blunt instruments[/url] family.

A blunt instrument is any solid object used as a weapon, which damages its target by applying direct mechanical force, and has no penetrating point or edge, or is wielded so that the point or edge is not the part of the weapon that inflicts the injury. Blunt instruments may be contrasted with edged weapons, which inflict injury by cutting or stabbing, or projectile weapons, where the projectiles, such as bullets or shot, are accelerated to a penetrating speed.

Blunt instruments typically inflict blunt force trauma, causing bruising, fractures and other internal bleeding. Depending on the parts of the body attacked, organs may be ruptured or otherwise damaged. Attacks with a blunt instrument may be fatal.
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bangs_%28hair%29]bangs[/url] family.
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eyebrows]eyebrows[/url] family.
This character has no eyebrows.\n\n[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/21/7321.jpg]Example[/url]
This character has thick eyebrows.\n\nExample: [url=https://vndb.org/c14849]Captain Doristram[/url]
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the wooden swords family.

This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blade]bladed instruments[/url] family.

A blade is the flat part of a tool, weapon, or machine (such as a fan) that normally has a cutting edge and/or pointed end typically made of a flaking stone, such as flint, or metal, most recently steel. 

A blade is used to cut, stab, slash, chop, slice, thrust, position and/or place (an example of this is razor wire), or scrape (an example of this is an ink eraser).

This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Projectile_weapons#Miscellaneous]projectile weapons[/url] family.\n\nA projectile is any object projected into space (empty or not) by the exertion of a force. Although any object in motion through space (for example a thrown baseball) may be referred to as a projectile, the term more commonly refers to a weapon.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutor#Private_tutors]private tutor[/url].\n\nA private tutor teaches a specific subject or skill to an individual student or small group of students. Such attention ideally allows the student to improve knowledge or skills more rapidly than in a classroom setting.

This character is a member of his/her school's discipline committee.\n\nA discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

trait_alias:

風紀委員長
description: This character is the leader of his/her school's discipline committee.\n\nA discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exorcist]exorcist[/url].\n\nIn some religions, an exorcist is a person who is believed to be able to cast out the devil or other demons. A priest, a nun, a monk, a healer, a shaman or other specially prepared or instructed person can be an exorcist. An exorcist is a person who performs the ridding of demons or other supernatural beings who are alleged to have possessed a person, or (sometimes) a building or even an object.

This character is mysterious.

At the beginning of the game (and sometimes even until its end) the player and/or the cast know almost nothing about this character. 

Sometimes even this character's name is unknown, so he/she is called a "Mysterious woman/man" (and etc.) during the game.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooch]brooch[/url].\n\nA brooch, also known in ancient times as a fibula, is a decorative jewelry item designed to be attached to garments, often to hold them closed. It is usually made of metal, often silver or gold but sometimes bronze or some other material. Brooches are frequently decorated with enamel or with gemstones and may be solely for ornament (as in the stomacher) or sometimes serve a practical function as a fastening, perhaps for a cloak.

This character was not born under normal circumstances, even in the fantasy setting it belongs to. It may have been made purposefully or may have come into being by an accident. The point is, it was made, not born.\n\nGolems animated by magic, creatures made in labs, all of them fall under this category. Walking dead do not count.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singer]singer[/url].

A singer is a person who uses his or her voice to produce music. Singers are often accompanied by musicians and instruments, while other people sing for pleasure. Vocal skill is usually a combination of innate talent and professional training.

Use this trait ONLY for professional singers or students of a singing class. For other characters who do sing in games, like music club or band members in a regular school, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i346]singing[/url] trait.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taiwanese_people]Taiwanese[/url].

Taiwanese people are individuals who either claim or are imputed cultural identity focused on Taiwan, or Taiwan Area which has been governed by the Republic of China (ROC) since 1945. 
At least three competing (occasionally overlapping) paradigms are used to identify someone as a Taiwanese person: a nationalist criteria, self-identification (including the concept of "New Taiwanese") criteria, and socio-cultural criteria.
This is a meta-trait to gather music related traits under 'engages in' category.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canadian]Canadian[/url].\n\nCanadians are the people who are identified with the country of Canada, residential, legal, historical, cultural or ethnic. For most Canadians, several (frequently all) of those types of connections exist and are the source(s) of them being considered Canadians.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ex-girlfriend]ex-girlfriend[/url].\n\nIn social relationships, an ex (plural is exes) is someone with whom a person was once associated. As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ex-girlfriend]ex-boyfriend[/url].\n\nIn social relationships, an ex (plural is exes) is someone with whom a person was once associated. As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.

This character is a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mouse]mouse[/URL].\n\nA mouse (plural: mice) is a small mammal belonging to the order of rodents, characteristically having a pointed snout, small rounded ears, and a long naked or almost hairless tail.
This character engages in inbreeding.\n\nInbreeding is when two people who are closely related by blood have a child.
This character is a siscon- a person who is always passionate about his/her sister and would do anything for her. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
This character is a brocon- a person who is always passionate about his/her brother and would do anything for him. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.

description:
A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_tie]hair tie[/URL] is a gadget used to fasten hair, particularly long hair, into a hairstyle (usually a ponytail). Hair ties are useful in securing one's hair back to keep it away from the face and to give some style to hair. [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Hair_ties.jpg]Typical hair ties[/URL] are round, elastic bands that are used in a very similar fashion as rubber bands. 

Not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i1061]ribbon hair tie[/URL], which is a ribbon (generally non-elastic) that is used like one would use a standard hair tie.

Also not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i661]hairpins[/URL] which are clips hat are used to keep hair in place.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/23/123.jpg]Example[/url]
