Twin Paizuri
double mammary intercourse
twin mammary intercourse
description:
This character is one of the performers of a twin boobjob. Apply [url=/i1629]i1629[/url] to the receiving character.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their breasts against each other with a man's penis between them.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/96/119096.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character confessed their feelings to beloved person, but was rejected, with all the psychological and other consequences.\n\nNote: Please ONLY use this trait when there is a clear confession of love and a clear rejection follows it up.

This character is often forgets to do something or cannot remember what people had told him. This can be caused by several health problems, magic or anything else.\n\nNote: If it's a one-time only loss of memory, use [url=http://vndb.org/i91]Amnesia[/url] instead. If the character is a careless scatterbrain, who generally doesn't pay attention to things, and not an actual health problem, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i929]Absentminded[/url] trait instead.

This person (or persons, rather) consists of multiple entities residing within the same vessel.\n\nNote: Do not confuse this with the [url=http://vndb.org/i275]Split Personality[/url], which is exclusively a mental issue.
A character with this trait enjoys [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/read]reading[/URL].\n\nAs in 'frequently seen in this VN while reading a book or magazine', but not exclusively.
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ball]ball[/url]. These generally are used in various kind of sports and exist in various sizes.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knee_pad]Knee pads[/url] are worn over the knees for protection. They can be used in various sports like volleybal, cycling and skateboarding.\n\nThey are also used in the military for protection while kneeling.
Ankle socks do not raise higher than to a person's ankles.\n\nNote: Do NOT use this trait for socks that stop at the heel.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rapes[/url] another character, but this event can be avoided by making different choices or succeeding better in earlier segments of the story.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait itself is intended to be used in situations where the player can avoid the rape scene altogether. For situations that fit the child traits better, like the ability to interrupt a rape scene in progress, use the child trait, [url=/i543]Rape Attempt[/url] in this example, instead.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loneliness]lonely[/url]. A lonely person is one who has no companions or friends; is lack of sympathetic or friendly companionship, intercourse and support. This person may or may not feel depressed because of their situation, it usually depends on whether they are aware of it or not. \n\nLoneliness is a complex and usually unpleasant emotional response to isolation or lack of companionship. Loneliness typically includes anxious feelings about a lack of connectedness or communality with other beings, both in the present and extending into the future. As such, loneliness can be felt even when surrounded by other people. The causes of loneliness are varied and include social, mental, emotional, and spiritual factors.
This character has multiple ponytails.

This character engages in music learning: this can mean learning how to play an instrument, to sing or another music related ability, without necessarily being a pro musician or having a music related role.

This character uses "uchi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

A feminine or girlish pronoun often used in western dialects especially the [url=http://vndb.org/i805]Kansai[/url] dialect. Generally written in kana. Plural form uchi-ra is used by both genders.

Although the singular form is also used by both sexes when talking about the household, e.g., "uchi no neko" ("my/our cat"), "uchi no chichi-oya" ("my father") due to being common do not use such a usage as a trait.
The character is a survivor of a tragedy, murder or serious accident.

A character with this trait wears a name tag, or has worn one for a significant portion of the game.\n\nA [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nametag]name tag[/URL] is a badge or sticker worn on the outermost clothing as a means of displaying the wearer's name for others to view.

trait_alias:
Beaver Hat
High Hat
Chimney Pot Hat
Cylinder Hat
Silk Hat
Stove Pipe Hat
Topper
description: A character with this trait wears a top hat, or has worn one for a significant portion of the game.\n\nA [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Top_hat]top hat[/URL] is a tall, flat-crowned, broad-brimmed hat, predominantly worn from the latter part of the 18th to the middle of the 20th century. As of the early 21st century, it is usually worn only with morning dress or white tie, in dressage, as servants' or doormen's livery, or as a fashion statement.

A character with this personality trait is frequently envious of others' various physical and non-physical possessions.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Envy]Envy[/URL] is a resentment which occurs when someone lacks another's quality, achievement or possession and wishes that the other lacked it.

Though used synonymously with [url=/i1284]Jealousy[/url] in modern English, the two words are different.

A character with this personality trait is often jealous of others.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jealousy]Jealousy[/URL] is an emotion, and the word typically refers to the negative thoughts and feelings of insecurity, fear, and anxiety over an anticipated loss of something of great personal value, particularly in reference to an existing connection. Jealousy often consists of a combination of emotions such as anger, resentment, inadequacy, helplessness and disgust.

Though jealous is used synonymously with [url=http://vndb.org/i1283]Envious[/url] in modern English, the two words are different.
The hair of this character is not well-kept and stick out in all directions. Such a "hairstyle" is mostly preferred by people with a cheeky or lazy character.
The preternatural entity possessing this character is not welcomed and is cohabiting against the host's wishes.
The preternatural entity possessing this character was either summoned or otherwise invited into the host's body.

This character is a preternatural entity who takes residence in a person's body or an inanimate object. The degree of control they have may vary, but the possessing entity is both foreign and not a naturally occurring phenomenon.
This character possesses another character with their (the host's) permission.\n\nNote: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].
This character possesses another character against their (the host's) wishes.\n\nNote: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scissors]scissors[/url].\n\nScissors are hand-operated shearing instruments. They consist of a pair of metal blades pivoted so that the sharpened edges slide against each other when the handles (bows) opposite to the pivot are closed. Scissors are used for cutting various thin materials, such as paper, cardboard, metal foil, thin plastic, cloth, rope, and wire. Scissors can also be used to cut hair and food. Scissors and shears are functionally equivalent, but larger implements tend to be called shears.

trait_alias:
Cropped Top
Belly Shirt
Half Shirt
Midriff Shirt
Tummy Top
Cutoff Shirt
Short Shirt
description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crop_top]crop top[/url].\n\nA crop top is a T-shirt or blouse with the lower part cut off, showing off some of the abdomen. The half shirt (or belly shirt) is a kind of shirt that is cut off from the bottom of the chest.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vegetarian]vegetarian[/url].\n\nVegetarianism is the practice of abstaining from the consumption of meat – red meat, poultry, seafood and the flesh of any other animal; it may also include abstention from by-products of animal slaughter.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicorn]unicorn[/url].\n\nThe unicorn is a legendary animal that has been described since antiquity as a beast with a large, pointed, spiraling horn projecting from its forehead.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pegasus]Pegasus[/url].

Pegasus is a winged divine stallion usually depicted as pure white in colour.

In the 20th and 21st century, it appeared in movies, in fantasy, in video games and in role play, where by extension, the term "pegasus" (plural: "pegasi") is often used to refer to any winged horse.
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fratricide]Fratricide[/URL] is the act of a person killing his or her brother.
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sororicide]Sororicide[/URL] is the act of killing one's own sister.
This character engages in sexual acts with another character that remains asleep for the duration of the sex scene. Apply [url=/i1650]i1650[/url] to the sleeping character.
The character easily panics and gets flustered easily. Usually when things does not go as planned/expected, the character will lose composure and panic and possibly screw up in some way.
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dual_wield]dual-wield weapons[/url].\n\nDual wielding is the technique of utilizing two weapons, one in each hand, during combat.

This character can see right through people. You cannot hide anything from him, because he still will guess, and bring you to clean water.\n\nNote: Please don't apply this trait to those who use telepathy.

A [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/pragmatic?s=t]pragmatic[/URL] person is somebody who makes decisions and take action based on logical, practical and/or rational considerations and perspectives. It should be noted that pragmatic people aren't necessarily cold or unemotional.

This character is a merperson (a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mermaid]mermaid[/url] or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merman]merman[/url]).\n\nA [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merfolk]merperson[/url] is a mythological creature with a human upper half (head, arms, and torso) and a fish-like lower half.
This character has orange hair.\n\nPlease see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character is shown to carry a stun gun and possibly use it as well.

A stun gun is a type of [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electroshock_weapon]electroshock weapon[/URL] that is used for incapacitating a person by administering electric shock aimed at disrupting superficial muscle functions. The shock is delivered by making direct contact with the target using the device.

Unlike a [url=/i2171]taser[/URL], a stun gun cannot launch its electrodes, so it must make direct contact with the target.

A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/competitive?s=t]competitive[/URL].\n\nCompetitive people have a strong desire to compete or to succeed. They typically hate to lose.

A character with this trait wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beanie_%28seamed_cap%29]beanie[/URL].

In other English-speaking countries, a "beanie" is a knitted cap (often woollen), known in the United States as a "stocking cap" and in Canada as a "tuque".

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Beanie.svg]Example.[/URL]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lion]lion[/url] or a lioness.\n\nThe lion (Panthera leo) is a large mammal of the Felidae (cat) family, and is often called the "king of the beasts".

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infant]infant[/url] or has the appearance of being an infant.\n\nThe term infant is typically applied to young children between the ages of 1 month and 12 months; however, definitions may vary between birth and 2 years of age. A newborn is an infant who is only hours, days, or up to a few weeks old.

A character with this trait wears a police officer's uniform. The character doesn't have to be an actual police officer to have this trait.

Accessories, equipment, colours and styles differ from country-to-country, and even state-to-state. It can also depend on a variety of other factors, such as an officer's rank or job within the force.

In general, both sexes wear:
* A hat with the force's insignia on it (usually as a metallic plate or an embroidery)
* A shirt
* A necktie
* A pair of trousers
* A utility belt that stores equipment (handcuffs, gun, pepper spray, radio, baton, etc.)
* Leather dress shoes, usually black or dark brown

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_visor]sports visor[/URL] is a type of crownless hat consisting simply of a visor or brim with a strap encircling the head. The top of the head is not covered and the visor protects only the face, including eyes, nose, and cheeks, from the sun.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_fetishism]sexual fetishist[/url], a person who receives the sexual arousal from a physical object, or from a specific situation. He can be crazy about the school swimsuits or girls' panties. He can have a fantastic erection while beholding the female fights in the mud, or just because of the fact that his sexual partner wears a cross necklace during the sexual intercourse.

This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shovel]shovel[/url].

A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Shovels are common tools that are used extensively in agriculture, construction, and gardening. 
Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a medium-length handle. Shovel blades are usually made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are usually made of wood or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).

trait_alias:
Coppola
Ascot cap
newsboy cap
newsy cap
Eight Piece Cap
Eight Panel
Cabbie
Bunnet
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flat_cap]flat cap[/url].

A flat cap is a rounded men's or women's cap with a small stiff brim in front. Cloths used to make the cap include wool, tweed (most common), and cotton. Less common materials may include leather or linen. Cord flat caps are also worn in various colours. The inside of the cap is usually lined with silk for comfort and warmth. The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newsboy_cap]newsboy cap[/url] is a variation of this kind of cap.

Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i517]Beret[/url]. Unlike berets, a flat cap has a visor (peak).

A character with this trait is afflicted with or experiences a delusion. It could be a result of a [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/hallucination?&path=/]hallucination[/URL], [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/brainwashing?&path=/]brainwashing[/URL] or drug abuse. It doesn't matter if they have an actual, established mental disorder or not.\n\nA [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/delusion?s=t]delusion[/URL] is a mistaken or misleading opinion, idea or belief, and/or a fixed false belief that is resistant to reason or confrontation with actual fact.

A character with this trait wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chef%27s_uniform]chef's uniform[/URL]. It doesn't matter if they're an actual chef or not.\n\nThe traditional chef's uniform (or chef's whites) includes a toque (traditional hat), white double-breasted jacket, and checkered pants. It is a common uniform in the Western world.

At law, an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accomplice]accomplice[/URL] is a person who actively participates in the commission of a crime, even though they take no part in the actual criminal offense. For example, in a bank robbery, the person who points the gun at the teller and asks for the money is guilty of armed robbery. However, anyone else directly involved in the commission of the crime, such as the lookout or the getaway car driver, is an accomplice, even though in the absence of an underlying offense keeping a lookout or driving a car would not be an offense.\n\nNot to be confused with an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accessory_%28legal_term%29]accessory[/URL] in that an accomplice is present at the actual crime, and could be prosecuted even if the main criminal (the principal) is not charged or convicted. An accessory is generally not present at the actual crime, and may be subject to lesser penalties than an accomplice or principal offender.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slipper]slippers[/url].\n\nA slipper is a semi-closed type of indoor/outdoor shoe, consisting of a sole held to the wearer's foot by a strap running over the toes or instep. Slippers are soft and lightweight compared to other types of footwear. They are mostly made of soft or comforting materials that allow a certain level of comfort for the wearer. This can range from faux fur to leather. Most slippers are worn in late autumn and winter and on occasion in other seasons. Slippers are cosy and most popular in cold countries.

trait_alias: Fictitious Member of the School Club
description: This character is a member of a student club. At least on paper, practically however he/she usually ditches club activities altogether and seldom appears in the clubroom.\n\nIf a character is not a member of a student club, not even on paper, then please use [url=http://vndb.org/i1381]School "Go Home Club" Member[/url] instead.

trait_alias: Gothic Lolita Hat\nSmall Top Hat\nSmall Side hat
description:
This character wears a [url=http://s2.thisnext.com/media/230x230/Gothic-Lolita-Elegant-Mini-Hat_F628F458.jpg]Mini hat[/url]. 

A mini hat is a tiny top hat which is usually worn on one side of the head, due to its size. It can be attached to a headband, although it's optional. 
More examples: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/79384.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/00/9200.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/85/79385.jpg]Example 3[/url].
This character loves reading books a lot, and may spend most of their free time on it.

This character wears a nurse's cap. 

A Nurse's cap can be:
- A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_cap]long cap[/url], that covers much of the nurse's hair, or
- a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurse%27s_cap]short cap[/url], that sits atop the nurse's hair.

Note: It may or may not be a part of an actual nurse's uniform.

A character with this trait is [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dishonesty]dishonest[/URL]. Perhaps they're not frequently dishonest (e.g., like a con artist or a pathological liar would be), but a dishonest act in the story defines their character and/or is a prominent plot point.\n\nDishonesty is to act without [URL=http://vndb.org/i822]honesty[/URL]. It is used to describe a lack of probity, cheating, lying or being deliberately deceptive or a lack in integrity, knavishness, perfidiosity, corruption or treacherousness.

trait_alias:
Cuckolding
Sniping
Stealing a Boyfriend
Stealing a Girlfriend
Stealing a Husband
Stealing a Partner
Stealing a Wife
description: A character with this trait engages in [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuckold]cuckolding[/URL], which is the act of stealing somebody else's committed romantic partner. It doesn't matter how the Netori achieves this.\n\nPlease apply the [URL=https://vndb.org/i1326]Netorare[/URL] trait to the character whose romantic partner was stolen from them by the Netori.

A character with this trait had his/her committed romantic partner [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuckold]stolen from them[/URL]. It doesn't matter if the "victim" in question enjoys this or not.\n\nPlease apply the [URL=https://vndb.org/i1325]Netori[/URL] trait to the character that did the stealing.

This character has sex in the quickie fix position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1693]i1693[/url] to the penetrating partner.

This is a variant of the [url=/i1692]doggy[/url] position. The receiving partner stands while bending at the waist and leaning on a piece of furniture, a wall, or their knees for support. The penetrating partner stands behind the receiving partner, possibly holding the receiving partner's hips or hands for support while they thrust.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/68/84168.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/70/84170.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/92/90892.jpg]Example 3[/url]
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bounty_hunter]bounty hunter[/url].\n\nA bounty hunter captures fugitives for a monetary reward.

A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/moody?s=t]moody[/URL]. Regardless of whether they have an actual mental condition or not, their moods change at the drop of a hat. Moody characters tend to also be impulsive and whimsical.

A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/whimsical]whimsical[/URL]. These characters act and make decisions on a whim. They change their tune on things at a moment's notice. It's often hard to tell what they're planning next.

This character participates in the competitions.

Competition is the official sporting or intellectual confrontation between several people or teams for the right to receive a prize, fame and/or moral satisfaction. This may be the internal contest of several school clubs as well as the big event like Olympic Games.

Please note that the small non-official contests and disputes are not count for this trait.

The character is involved in at least one scene of [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-penetrative_sex#Mutual_masturbation]mutual masturbation[/URL].\n\nMutual masturbation involves the manual stimulation of genitals by two or more people who stimulate themselves or each other. This may involve [URL=http://vndb.org/g917]handjob[/URL], [URL=http://vndb.org/g750]footjob[/URL], [URL=http://vndb.org/g1515]fingering[/URL] and/or other sexual activity.

A character is impregnated without their consent. This usually implies rape and/or sexual slavery, but other methods (through magic or "science") count as well. Whether a baby is born from this pregnancy or not, is irrelevant from the point of view of this traits. The only crucial factor is the clear lack of consensuality.\n\nPlease only use this trait when the state of pregnancy is confirmed ingame, either through narration, dialogs or by showing the character pregnant.
This character is stylish.\n\nA stylish person is someone who tries to keep pace with the latest fashion trends to dress elegantly and/or stunningly.
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_chat]chats online[/url] with others.

This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisp]lisp[/url].\n\nA lisp, also known as sigmatism, is a speech impediment in which a person cannot articulate sibilants ([s], [z], [ʒ], [ʃ], [tʃ], [dʒ]). These misarticulations often result in unclear speech. This disease is mostly affects children. There are physiological and social factors that may cause a lisp. For example, a long chronic diseases, specific mouth anatomy (including the teeth broken in a fight), the unwillingness of parents to correct the pronunciation of a child, as well as heredity and more.

This character can fly using their own wings, special devices (such as jetpack), magic, or supernatural powers.\n\nPlease use the [url=http://vndb.org/i368]Pilot[/url] and [url=http://vndb.org/i255]Piloting[/url] traits instead, when a character is piloting the aircraft.

This character sometimes switches to the "biting" manner of speaking, ignoring the etiquette, morality, or purity of his speech. He knows the weak points of the interlocutor and tries to stab him there as hard as possible. He might do so in order to annoy, humiliate, or just to tease someone.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raygun]Rayguns[/url] are a type of fictional directed-energy weapon. They are a well-known feature of science fiction. According to the stories, when activated, a raygun emits a ray, typically visible, usually lethal if it hits a human target, often destructive if it hits mechanical objects, with properties and other effects unspecified or varying.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/53/59853.jpg]Jester's costume[/url] usually consist of a multi-colored long-sleeved tunic and puffy pants, a hat with two or more "horns" (pom poms or bells are optional), a star-shaped or ruffle collar, and a jester's shoe covers.

description: This character is the subject of someone's sexual dream, fantasy, illusion, etc. Unlike the dream's host, this character may not be aware of such event. On the other hand, he/she may be the one who instigated this dream in the host's mind using magic, hypnosis, supernatural abilities or other methods.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pointed_hat]pointed hat[/url].\n\nPointed hats have been a distinctive item of headgear of a wide range of cultures throughout history. Good examples of modern pointed hat are: Santa hat, party hat, night cap and the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conical_Asian_hat]conical asian hat[/url].
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bartender]bartender[/url], a person who serves alcoholic beverages at a bar.

trait_alias:
School Classic Swimsuit
Former Type School Swimsuit
Old Type School Swimsuit
Skirt Type School Swimsit
Kyuusuku
Kyuu Sukumizu
Kyuugata Sukuuru Mizugi
Sukaato-gata Sukumizu
旧スク
旧スク水
旧型スクール水着
スカート型スク水
description:
This character can be seen in the "[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/34/60434.jpg]old type[/url]" school swimsuit.

This type of swimwear began to appear in Japanese schools around the 1970s. Its color is usually dark blue, violet or black. There are also the Moe-versions like translucent or white, which is popular among the perverts, since the drenched white swimsuit becomes almost transparent.
Old type school swimsuit has a distinctive front skirt. Unlike the very first version of the school swimsuit (so-called "old old type"), which consists of two separate pieces (panties and "tunic"), in this type of swimwear the back part of the panties is a continuation of the tunic, while the front part is sewn to the inner part of the tunic along two lines, as it shown in the picture. However, if desired, a small area above the pubis can be exposed. There are also might be the tags with the girl's name or class, which can be sewn to the frontside, backside or bottom of the tunic. Old type school swimsuit is mostly worn by girls of the junior or middle schools, although it can be worn by anyone.

More information can be found [url=http://kgtblog.seesaa.net/archives/201204-1.html]here[/url] and [url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/スクール水着]here[/url] (Japanese).

trait_alias:
School Modern Swimsuit
Shinsuku
Shin Sukumizu
Shingata Sukuuru Mizugi
新スク
新スク水
新型スクール水着
description:
This character can be seen in the "[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/35/60435.jpg]new type[/url]" school swimsuit.

This type of swimwear began to appear in Japanese schools around the 1980s. As well as the old type, this swimsuit can be dark blue, violet, black or white. It's a one-piece swimsuit, which is most common in modern Japanese schools. In contrast to the previous type, it can have both a closed and an open back. It may also contain a tag with the name of the girl. This kind of swimsuit is commonly worn by high school students, but this is not necessarily so.

More information can be found [url=http://kgtblog.seesaa.net/archives/201204-1.html]here[/url] and [url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/スクール水着]here[/url] (Japanese).

trait_alias:
Racing Swimsuit
Competitive Swimsuit
Kyouei Mizugi
Kyouei-gata Mizugi
Supootsu Mizugi
競泳水着
競泳型水着
スポーツ水着
description: This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/36/60436.jpg]sports swimsuit[/url].\n\nThis type of swimwear is available in various (and multiple) colors and designs. It is made of the new generation materials to be highly comfortable for professional swimming. In Japan, it's mostly worn by participants of the school competitions and the sportsmen, as well as by all who have the desire and the money to buy such a swimsuit.

This character engages in sexual activities that are discussed or explained but never shown.\n\nAs a rule of thumb, if you can't pin down the time and place of the implied sex scene, don't use this trait. For example don't use this tag for long time jumps, after which the couple in question is shown to have kids, even though they didn't have a single H-scene.

Long Swimming Spats

Swimming Half-spats

Haafu Supattsu Mizugi

ロングスパッツ水着
ユニタード水着
description: This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/37/60437.jpg]swimming spats[/url].\n\nIt's a variation of sports swimsuit that cover not only the torso, but also the foots of woman (partially or completely). Men's version may be similar to the woman's, or it may be just the tight-fitting shorts/leggings. This type of swimwear appeared in the world around the 2000s.
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pen]pen[/url].\n\nA pen is a writing implement used to apply ink to a surface, usually paper, for writing or drawing.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt]Chastity Belt[/url].

A chastity belt is a locking item of clothing designed to prevent sexual intercourse. They may be used to protect the wearer from rape or temptation. Some devices have been designed with additional features to prevent masturbation.

Modern Chastity Belts are most often used in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt_%28BDSM%29]BDSM play[/url]. Chastity belts in BDSM are a way for the wearer to surrender control over their sexual behavior by providing a physical barrier that deters sexual intercourse and possibly masturbation. The device is usually worn by the submissive in the relationship, as a way of providing control to the dominant (often referred to as the "keyholder" in this context). This is a part of the wider practice of orgasm denial.

This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_%28sport%29]swimming[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nA school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Swimming is the self propulsion of a person through water or other liquid, for survival, recreation, sport, exercise or other reason.

This character is forced or tricked into being nude in public areas (school, shopping malls, etc.) or in front of a group of people through blackmailing or the society's rules. This is different from exhibitionism in that the character is not doing this voluntarily.\n\nThis trait only covers nudity itself. If this character also has sex in a public area while being naked, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i879]Sex in Public[/url] as well.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hospital_gown]hospital gown[/url].\n\nA hospital gown is a long loose piece of clothing worn in a hospital by someone doing or having an operation. It can also be used as clothing for bedridden patients.
This character is involved in a pornographic video against their will (as a subject of rape) or unconsciously (using a hidden camera, deception, hypnosis, etc.)

trait_alias:
Pornography Filming
Porn Shooting
Pornography Shooting
Porn Acting
Pornographic Acting
Consensual Porn Filming
Consensual Porn Photo Shooting
Consensual Porn Photographing
description: This character is involved in a pornographic video or photo shooting on their own will, either as a professional porn actor, or as an amateur.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shrug_%28clothing%29]shrug[/URL] is a cropped, cardigan-like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted. Generally, a shrug covers less of the body than a vest would, but it is more tailored than a shawl. Shrugs are typically worn as the outermost layer of an outfit, with a full shirt, tank top, or dress beneath. A shrug covers a small portion of the upper body. Some shrugs are tied together just below the bustline.

This character participates in their own marriage ceremony during the story (mostly at the end).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wedding]wedding[/url] is the ceremony where people are united in marriage. Wedding traditions and customs vary greatly between cultures, ethnic groups, religions, countries, and social classes. Most wedding ceremonies involve an exchange of wedding vows by the couple, presentation of a gift (offering, ring(s), symbolic item, flowers, money), and a public proclamation of marriage by an authority figure or leader.

Please don't apply this trait to those who were married before the story began.

trait_alias:
Dry Sex
Dry Humping
Heavy petting
Outercourse
Sexual petting
Dry sex
Dry humping
Frottage
description: Frottage is the general term for the act of rubbing any part of the body, including the buttocks, the breasts, abdomen, thighs, feet, hands, legs and sexual organs against the sexual organ of another person, whether naked or clothed. Couples may engage in frottage as a form of foreplay or simply as a method to achieve sexual gratification without the penetrative aspects of vaginal, anal or oral sexual intercourse, which may be a way of preserving virginity or a way of practicing safe sex.
This character is a beautician. He or she might work at a beauty salon.\n\nThis can include hair stylists, cosmeticians, and manicurists.

This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tea_ceremony]tea ceremony[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nStudents involved in such a club may learn and practice how to prepare and drink tea in a traditional way.
This character is involved in sexual activities while they are drunk.

The person in receipt of mentorship may be referred to as a protégé (male), a protégée (female), an apprentice or, in recent years, a mentee.\n\n[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mentorship]Mentorship[/URL] is a personal developmental relationship in which a more experienced or more knowledgeable person helps to guide a less experienced or less knowledgeable person. However, true mentoring is more than just answering occasional questions or providing ad hoc help. It is about an ongoing relationship of learning, dialogue, and challenge.

trait_alias:
Domestic Abuse
Domestic Violence
Spousal Abuse
Family Violence
Intimate Partner Violence
description:
This character is a victim of the acts of domestic violence.

Domestic violence can be broadly defined as a pattern of abusive behaviors by one or both partners in an intimate relationship such as marriage, dating, family, friends or cohabitation. Domestic violence has many forms including physical aggression (hitting, kicking, biting, shoving, restraining, slapping, throwing objects), or threats thereof; sexual abuse; emotional abuse; controlling or domineering; intimidation; stalking; passive/covert abuse (e.g., neglect); and economic deprivation.

In games and anime Domestic Violence may appear as a comedy routine.
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pet]pet[/url]. They may or may not actually be an animal.

This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_roleplay]petplay[/url] or animal roleplay or they are treated as a pet against their will by another character.\n\nIf they actually are a pet and not a person simply being treated as one please use the [url=https://vndb.org/i1369]Pet[/url] trait.

trait_alias: School Track and Field Club Member
description: This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Track_and_field]track & field[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nA school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Track and field is a group of athletic sports, consisting mainly of various kinds of running, jumping and throwing, that take place on a track and the enclosed field.

trait_alias:
School Athletic Club Chairman
School Track and Field Club Chairman
School Track and Field Club Captain
School Athletic Club Captain
Leader of Athletic Club
Leader of Track and Field Club
description: This character is the leader of a school athletic club.

This character wears a [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/53/64153.jpg]decorative belt[/url].\n\nIt rarely fulfil belt's primary function of supporting the clothes or carrying the ammunition, so it's mostly a tribute to fashion. It often has a broad base and decorated with various patterns, frippery, etc. Such belts are often worn asymmetrically on the hips.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Culture_of_Japan]cultural[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nA school cultural club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected discipline, that is somehow related to the culture, arts, science, IT and other non-sports subjects.
This character is a native of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia]Indonesia[/url], or a person of Indonesian descent.
This character celebrates a birthday during the course of the story.

This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frot]frot[/url].

Frot is a non-penetrative sexual activity involving direct penis-to-penis contact.

trait_alias:
School Unusual Club Member
School Unorthodox Club Member
School Uncommon Club Member
School Unconventional Club Member
School Nontraditional Club Member
School Eccentric Club Member
School Peculiar Club Member
description: This character is a member of a club that is not common in terms of the real Japanese schools. For example, a club of occultism, a club of sexual humiliation, a club of gambling games, etc. These clubs might be official or not.

This character is taciturn.\n\nThis character is physically able to speak, but prefers to remain silent because of his serious/sullen personality or mental affliction. Apply this trait only to those who spoke at least once in the story or when there was other proof of their ability to speak.

trait_alias:
Underground School Club Member
Unregistered School Club Member
Shadow School Club Member
Secret School Club Member
description: This character is a member of the school club, the existence of which wasn't approved by the school administration, and thus, this club is considered to be underground. A members of such club are trying to conceal the place and time of club meetings, and they may even be in a state of war with the Student Council and/or Discipline Committee.

trait_alias: Not a Member of the School Club
description:
This character is actually not a member of any club. 

Please use this trait only in the cases when it is an important part of the plot (eg, a character is trained as a magician in his spare time after school), or when it somehow reveals the traits of the character's personality (eg, a character is too lazy to participate in club activities, and even being criticized by people around because of this).

Also, the name of this trait implies that a character should at least attend school, rather than completely ignore the classes together with clubs.

If a character is a member of a club, just refuses to actually show up for the activities of his/her club, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i1320]Ghost Member of the School Club[/url] instead.

trait_alias: School Classic Music Club Member\nSchool Light Music Club Member\nSchool Popular Music Club Member
description:
This character is a member of a music club associated with a school.

The main goal of the music club members is to gather together to learn and play music, sing the songs, and perfecting their skills day by day.
The club has the opportunity to hold a performance at the school's festival, which is usually a concert at the auditorium.

This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Badminton]badminton[/url]. \n\nBadminton is a racquet sport played by either two opposing players (singles) or two opposing pairs (doubles), who take positions on opposite halves of a rectangular court divided by a net. Players score points by striking a shuttlecock with their racquet so that it passes over the net and lands in their opponents' half of the court.

This character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voyeurism]voyeurism[/url].\n\nUsually it means that this character is secretly observed by another character (a voyeurist) particularly in intimate situations, during changing clothes, sexual intercourse, etc. The victim may or may not know about this.
This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glaive]glaive[/url].\n\nA glaive is a European polearm weapon, consisting of a single-edged blade on the end of a pole.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drama]drama[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nDrama club exists to provide an opportunity for students interested in theater to learn the art of acting and be able to create a performance, starting with the script and ending with decorations. Students create requisite and clothes for the show on their own. However, the purchase of necessary materials is provided at the expense of a school. Club can give performances in school during festivals and holidays.

trait_alias:
Hen-pecked
Under the Thumb
Dominated by Wife
Dominated by Girlfriend
description: This character may seem cool and brutal for the audience until the moment his wife/girlfriend will come and say her word. In her presence he immediately becomes compliant and obedient. In other words, this kind of people humbly recognizes the leadership and authority of their woman. In some comedic stories women can even use a frying pan or other painful tool as an argument.\n\nNote that this trait has nothing to do with sexual submission. Use [url=http://vndb.org/i1087]Submissive Partner[/url] in this case.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baker]baker[/url].\n\nA baker is someone who makes, bakes and sells breads, rolls, biscuits or cookies, and/or crackers using an oven or other concentrated heat source. Cakes and similar foods may also be produced, as the traditional boundaries between what is produced by a baker as opposed to a pastry chef, have blurred in recent decades.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Construction_worker]construction worker[/url].\n\nA construction worker is someone who is involved in the physical construction of the built environment and its infrastructure.
This character uses "yo" (余), a formal [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronoun[/url], to address themselves.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url] club associated with a school.

The miko club may train girls wanting to get acquainted with the life of miko, and even become one of them in the future.
Miko is a Shinto term in Japan, indicating a shrine maiden or a supplementary priestess who was once likely seen as a shaman but in modern Japanese culture is understood to be an institutionalized role in daily shrine life, trained to perform tasks, ranging from sacred cleansing to performing the Kagura, a sacred dance.

trait_alias:
School Miko Club Chairman
Leader of School Miko Club
School Shrine Maiden Club President
School Shrine Maiden Club Chairman
Leader of School Shrine Maiden Club
description: This character is the leader of a school [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url] club.
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zombie_%28fictional%29]zombie[/url], a type of reanimated corpse.

This character was involved in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duel]duel[/url].

Historically, a duel is an arranged engagement in combat between two individuals, with matched weapons in accordance with agreed-upon rules.
The duel was based on a code of honour. Duels were fought not so much to kill the opponent as to gain "satisfaction", that is, to restore one's honour (or compete for a woman) by demonstrating a willingness to risk one's life for it, and as such the tradition of duelling was originally reserved for the male members of nobility.

You can also use this trait for non-armed duels (competitive, for example), as long as this is a question of a honour, with possible significant risk to lose something or someone important for a duelist.

Chaps are sturdy coverings for the legs consisting of leggings and a belt. They are buckled on over trousers with the chaps' integrated belt, but unlike trousers they have no seat and are not joined at the crotch. They are designed to provide protection for the legs and are usually made of leather or a leather-like material. They are most commonly associated with the cowboy culture of the American west as a protective garment to be used when riding a horse through brushy terrain.

This character engages in mercy killing.\n\nA mercy kill is a death blow to end the suffering of a severely wounded person or animal. It may be a mercy killing of civilians or soldiers, friends or enemies, with or without the sufferer's consent.

This character is endowed with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wisdom]wisdom[/url].\n\nWisdom is the ability to think and act using knowledge, experience, common sense, and insight. This quality is usually inherent to middle-aged and old people, who have seen many things in their life, and can give a good advice to those who may need it.
This character is seen with a radio.\n\nA transistor radio is a small portable radio receiver that uses transistor-based circuitry.
This character masturbates in a public place. It doesn't matter if this is carried out discreetly or openly.

This character is subjected to some experimental treatment with or without their consent. The goal of the research can be anything from curing a disease to developing super-soldiers. As long as the experiments are seemingly scientific in nature, and not magical, the trait applies. Whether said research and science would be feasible in real life or not is irrelevant.\n\n[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_subject_research]Wikipedia article[/url]

trait_alias:

Scientific Club Member
description: This character is a member of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science]science[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nA school science club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on scientific research.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Procuring_(prostitution)]pimp[/url] or [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=madame]madame[/url].

The PIMP abbreviation stands for "Person Into Marketing Prostitutes", thus, it's an agent for hookers who receives part of the money earned by prostitutes in return for advertising services, physical protection, or for providing, and possibly monopolizing a location where the prostitute may engage clients.
According to different versions, "madame" may be a female version of pimp, as well as the owner and manager of brothel, who hires the pimps and prostitutes.

This character uses "watashi", one of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese Pronouns[/url] for "I" to refer to themselves.\n\nIn formal or polite contexts, this is gender neutral, but when used in informal or casual contexts, it is usually perceived as feminine.

A dandere character is one who is normally quiet and silent, possibly to the point of coming across as emotionless at times, but will suddenly become talkative, sweet and cute when alone with the right person if they manage to push the right button to get them to pour their heart out, revealing that they're actually just shy.

This character is penetrated with a plug tail.

This is an anal plug with a tail on the end. The tail may resemble that of a real animal, like a fox or dog, or that of a fictional creature, like a succubus. Such a device may be used in sexual petplay.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/29/29029.jpg]Example[/url]
This character wears simple clothes made ​​of rags. This is the clothes of slaves and poor people, who are not able to buy civilized clothes.
Discrimination is the prejudicial treatment of an individual based on his or her membership - or perceived membership - in a certain group or category.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrinkle]wrinkles[/url] somewhere on their body, especially on the face.\n\nA wrinkle is a fold, ridge or crease in the skin. Skin wrinkles typically appear as a result of aging processes, habitual sleeping positions, loss of body mass, or temporarily, as the result of prolonged immersion in water. Age wrinkling in the skin is promoted by habitual facial expressions, aging, sun damage, smoking, poor hydration, and various other factors.

This character has the cut of eyes, when the top of the eye is drawn with a thick flat line, which used to effect a bored, expressionless, or scornful face for a character.

Note: Please, only apply this trait to the characters who have such facial expression all the time, not just occasionally.

Example: http://s.vndb.org/sf/57/69257.jpg

The character tagged with this creates one or more identical copies of someone (could be him/herself), through supernatural / sci-fi means.\n\nThe trait does not cover the actual biological process of extracting DNA and using it to grow organs.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basketball]basketball[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nBasketball is a sport played by two teams of five players on a rectangular court. The objective is to shoot a ball through a hoop 46 cm in diameter and 3 m high mounted to a backboard at each end.

This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Association_football]soccer[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nA school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Soccer is a sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.
A game developer is a software developer that specializes in video game development – the process and related disciplines of creating video games.

This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newspaper]newspaper[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nThe newspaper may either be published online or on paper. Students involved in such a club often try to get their hands on the latest scoops.
This character is a member of his/her school's health committee.\n\nStudents in the health committee usually help out in the school's infirmary.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prison_officer]prison officer[/url], also known as corrections officer, correctional officer, detention officer or penal officer, is a person responsible for the supervision, safety, and security of prisoners in a prison, jail, or similar form of secure custody. Historically, terms such as jailer, jail guard, prison guard, and turnkey have also been used.\n\nCorrections officers are responsible for the care, custody, and control of individuals who have been arrested and are awaiting trial while on remand or who have been convicted of a crime and sentenced to serve time in a prison or jail. They are also responsible for the safety and security of the facility itself. Most officers are employed by the government of the jurisdiction in which they operate, though some are employed by private companies.

String instruments are musical instruments that produce sound from vibrating strings. In most strings instruments, the vibrations are transmitted to the body of the instrument, which also vibrates, along with the air inside it. In the Hornbostel-Sachs scheme of musical instrument classification, used in organology, they are called chordophones. Some common instruments in the string family are violin, guitar, sitar, electric bass, viola, cello, harp, double bass, rabab, banjo, mandolin, ukulele, and bouzouki.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin]violin[/url], also known as a fiddle, is a string instrument, usually with four strings tuned in perfect fifths. It is the smallest, highest-pitched member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin_family]violin family[/url] of string instruments, which also includes the viola, the cello and the double bass.

The harp is a multi-string musical instrument which has the plane of its strings positioned perpendicularly to the soundboard. Organologically, it is in the general category of chordophones (stringed instruments) and has its own sub category (the harps). All harps have a neck, resonator and strings. Some, known as frame harps, also have a pillar; those without the pillar are referred to as open harps. \n\nThese instruments also belong into this category: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyre]Lyre[/url] (a smaller harp-like instrument) , [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konghou]Konghou[/url] (Chinese harp. In Japanese it is called "Kugo"), [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chang_%28instrument%29]Chang[/url] (Persian).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind_instrument]wind instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that contains some type of resonator (usually a tube), in which a column of air is set into vibration by the player blowing into (or over) a mouthpiece set at the end of the resonator. The pitch of the vibration is determined by the length of the tube and by manual modifications of the effective length of the vibrating column of air. In the case of some wind instruments, sound is produced by blowing through a reed; others require buzzing into a metal mouthpiece.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brass_instrument]brass instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that produces sound by sympathetic vibration of air in a tubular resonator in sympathy with the vibration of the player's lips. Brass instruments are also called labrosones, literally meaning "lip-vibrated instruments".

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flute]flute[/url] is a family of musical instrument of the woodwind group. Unlike woodwind instruments with reeds, a flute is an aerophone or reedless wind instrument that produces its sound from the flow of air across an opening. According to the instrument classification of Hornbostel–Sachs, flutes are categorized as edge-blown aerophones.

A musician who plays the flute can be referred to as a flute player, a flautist, a flutist, or, less commonly, a fluter.

Aside from the voice, flutes are the earliest known musical instruments. A number of flutes dating to about 43,000 to 35,000 years ago have been found in the Swabian Alb region of Germany. These flutes demonstrate that a developed musical tradition existed from the earliest period of modern human presence in Europe.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percussion]percussion instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that is sounded by being struck or scraped by a beater (including attached or enclosed beaters or rattles); struck, scraped or rubbed by hand; or struck against another similar instrument. The percussion family is believed to include the oldest musical instruments, following the human voice.\n\nThe percussion section of an orchestra most commonly contains instruments such as timpani, snare drum, bass drum, cymbals, triangle and tambourine. However, the section can also contain non-percussive instruments, such as whistles and sirens, or a blown conch shell. On the other hand, keyboard instruments, such as the celesta, are not normally part of the percussion section, but keyboard percussion instruments such as the glockenspiel and xylophone (which do not have piano keyboards) are included.

trait_alias:
Drums
Drum Kit
Tambourine
Snare Drum
Bass Drum
Tongue drum
Goblet drum

Bongo drums
description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drum]drum[/url] is a member of the percussion group of musical instruments. In the Hornbostel-Sachs classification system, it is a membranophone. Drums consist of at least one membrane, called a drumhead or drum skin, that is stretched over a shell and struck, either directly with the player's hands, or with a drum stick, to produce sound. There is usually a resonance head on the underside of the drum, typically tuned to a slightly lower pitch than the top drumhead. Other techniques have been used to cause drums to make sound, such as the thumb roll. Drums are the world's oldest and most ubiquitous musical instruments, and the basic design has remained virtually unchanged for thousands of years.\n\nDrums may be played individually, with the player using a single drum, and some drums such as the djembe are almost always played in this way. Others are normally played in a set of two or more, all played by the one player, such as bongo drums and timpani. A number of different drums together with cymbals form the basic modern drum kit.

This character identifies as a non-binary gender.

Non-Binary Genders are gender identities that don't fit within the accepted binary of male and female. People can feel they are both, neither, or some mixture thereof.

This is regardless of their physical sex or the way they present. Use the [url=http://vndb.org/i737]Futanari[/url] to mark that.

Please don't use this trait for characters of unconfirmed gender. This trait is only for characters officially confirmed to be of non-binary gender.

Intentional restriction of oxygen to the brain for the purposes of sexual arousal.\n\nUse this trait for the character being strangled, whether it is done by another person or by a person to themselves. Use i1657 for the person performing the strangling.

The character is an active member of the library committee.\nThe library committee is an student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of preserving the library and realizing tramits such as books being checked out.
This is used to describe a character with a suntan, either naturally applied by the sun or through artificial means.

This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woman_on_top_(sex_position)#Reverse_missionary_position]reverse missionary[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1695]i1695[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner lies on their back, while the receiving partner lies on on top of them, facing down. This is similar to the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] position, except the participants' positions are switched.

Don't apply this trait to lesbians engaging in tribadism, gays engaging in frot, or lesbians using a double-ended didlo. Use [url=/i93]i93[/url] and [url=/i1694]i1694[/url] instead.

The Japanese calligraphy (Shodo) is one of the most popular fine arts of Japan. Calligraphical works are appreciated not less than products of painting. But this kind of the fine arts possesses also philosophical sense. In the simplest understanding the calligraphy is an art to write beautifully.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prisoner]prisoner[/URL], also known as an inmate or detainee, is a person who is deprived of liberty against their will. 

This can be by confinement, captivity, or by forcible restraint. 

The term applies particularly to those on trial or serving a prison sentence in a prison.

This character is subject to urethral sounding.\n\nUrethral play can involve the introduction of either soft or rigid items into the meatus of the penis (as well as farther in). This action in the male may be directly or indirectly associated with stimulation of the prostate gland and some types of bladder control.
This character's sclera (the white of the eye) is a color that is not found on humans normally.
This character is fluent in more than one language.
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginity]virgin[/url] at the time she is married.
This character sets fire to a property.
This character's power or powers include setting things on fire with their mind.
A pleated skirt is a skirt with folds/pleats in them. Common in most school uniforms.

A pinafore is a sleeveless dress intended to be worn over a top or blouse. Unlike an apron, it is a full sleeveless dress with two holes cut out for arms, and unlike other sleeveless dresses should be worn over a blouse or an underdress.
This character wears a shirt or a dress with puffy sleeves.
This character wears a very thin, almost string-like ribbon tie.

This person have voluntary sexual relationships with other people, without being emotionally involved. Typically two good friends who have casual sex without a monogamous relationship or any kind of commitment. Or a random people from some Internet club having fun more than once. At the same time, both sex friends may be married to other people and, in fact, engage in sexual infidelity (with their spouse aware of it or not). Still, don't confuse them with lovers, who are involved romantically as well.

This character has no eyes. They may have lost them, or their species may naturally have no eyes.

If a character is simply blind, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i439]Blindness[/url] trait instead. Note that having no eyes does not imply blindness (and vice versa). For example, the character can be an alien who sees through psychic methods.

If a character's eyes are just not drawn (possibly due to being covered by bangs or as part of the art style (common for protagonists)), and it's never stated or implied that the character has no eyes, use [url=/i116]Hidden[/url] instead.

Hispanics and Latinos are an ethnolinguistic group of Americans with genealogical origins in the countries of Latin America and Spain. More generally it includes all persons in the United States who self-identify as Hispanic or Latino. Hispanic and Latinos are racially diverse, although predominately White or Mestizo. As a result of their racial diversity, Hispanics form an ethnicity sharing a language (Spanish) and cultural heritage, rather than a race.

This charater carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kukri]kukri[/url].\n\nThe kukri or khukuri (Nepali: खुकुरी) is a Nepalese knife with an inwardly curved edge, similar to a machete, used as both a tool and as a weapon in Nepal and neighbouring countries of South Asia.

Attempted murder is the intent to murder, meaning that the perpetrator either tried to murder and failed (example: attempted to shoot the victim and missed or stabbing with a knife and failing to kill) or planning to commit a murder (example: purchasing a gun or other deadly weapon with intent to use it on someone and writing about their intent to kill).

This person sometimes lose connection with real world in order to devote their-self to idle dreams and illusions. At the same time, they cease to notice everything that is happening around. Their companions have to scream or use a brute force to make them come down to earth.

A nightgown, nightie or nightdress is a loosely hanging item of nightwear, today almost exclusively worn by women. A nightgown is made from cotton, silk, satin, or nylon and may be decorated with lace appliqués or embroidery at the bust and hem.
This character is a father-con - a person who is overly attached to his/her father and would do anything for him. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball]baseball[/url]  or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Softball]softball[/url] club associated with a school.\n\nBaseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each who take turns batting and fielding. Softball is a variant of baseball played with a larger ball on a smaller field, with relaxed rules, what made it popular among amateurs and females.

This person occasionally or regularly participates in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Street_racing]street races[/url].\n\nStreet racing is an unsanctioned and illegal form of motor racing that occurs on a public road.

This character is drugged by one or several characters. He/she usually, but not always, has no knowledge of the act and those responsible.

It's not limited to just narcotic or aphrodisiac, but rather indicates any substance, chemical, pill, drug, potion, etc. with effect ranging from heightening/lowering sexual desire to affecting or interfering with the brain/body functions.

This tag is not for medication or prescribed medicine.

This character uses drug, potion, pill, etc. on other(s) to achieve his/her goal, not necessarily related to sexual desire. The receiver usually, but not always, has no knowledge of the act.\n\nThis tag isn't for giving medication or prescribed drug to other(s).
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cupid]cupid[/url], god of love. The character may have the iconic bow and arrow to create love between people.
